outline:outline.outline:title: The Tengyur
བསྟན་འགྱུར།
outline:outline.outline:name: bstan 'gyur (sde dge)
outline:outline.outline:description: The collected treatises: the Tibetan translations of scriptural works by the great Indian Buddhist masters.

The Tengyur

Brief guides to the Tengyur and its subdivisions will be added to this “Learn more...” button, and those within the various section views, over the coming months.

As noted above, the Tengyur is included in this version of the Reading Room “lobby” for preliminary reference and gradual development, although 84000 (with the exception of a single project) has not yet started to focus resources on Tengyur translations. Even the “lobby” details of this Tengyur section—the titles, etc.—require extensive editing.

outline:node.outline:name: Tantra
rgyud/
Tantra
outline:node.outline:description: Commentaries, instructions, and liturgical works on the tantras (Toh 1180-3785)

Tantra

This is by far the largest division of the Tengyur, containing no less than 2,626 works.

Traditionally it is presented as one undivided collection. Here, however, it has been subdivided—not only for easy reference, but also for technical reasons, to enable slower computer systems to load the extensive title data rapidly and without timing out.

The subdivisions follow the structure set out by Zhuchen Tsültrim Rinchen, the 18th century editor of the Degé Tengyur, in his catalogue to the collection (Toh 4569). He classifies the divisions and their works from “higher” to “lower.” The initial division is into the four principal classes of tantra, together with a fifth section for works he classifies as common to all four, or with no definite affinity to a single class. The first (and very large) Unexcelled Yoga tantra class is further subdivided into four main groups, with further subdivision in some of them, and the fifth section is subdivided into the collections of which it is largely composed.

The Degé Tengyur's system of classifying the tantras is by no means the only possible one, and Tsültrim Rinchen frequently notes diverging opinions put forward by other scholars and editors. There are even differences between his classification and that of Situ Paṇchen Chökyi Jungné in the Degé Kangyur. Many of Tsültrim Rinchen’s choices were, he says, dictated by tradition and by past precedent, notably that of Butön Rinchen Drup (bu ston rin chen grub, 1290-1364), although the latter’s system is far from being fully reproduced in the Degé Tengyur.

outline:node.outline:name: Unexcelled Yoga tantra
bla med rgyud/
Anuttarayoga / Yoganiruttaratantra
outline:node.outline:description: Commentaries on tantras of the highest class, divided into “non-dual,” “wisdom,” and “skillful means” tantras (Toh 1180-2502).

Unexcelled Yoga tantras

The texts in this subsection are works on tantras classified as belonging to the highest of the four classes of tantra according to the gsar ma (“new”) traditions. The Tibetan term for the Unexcelled Yoga class, rnal ’byor bla na med pa’i rgyud, has traditionally been back-translated into Sanskrit as anuttarayogatantra, but this term is not attested in Sanskrit texts; using forms that are attested, yoganiruttaratantra or yogottaratantra are preferable.

The Unexcelled Yoga tantras are characterized by the practices of the two phases of generation and completion, by their approach to the deity as inseparable in all respects from the practitioner, and by their emphasis on wisdom or awareness (jñāna, ye shes).

Tantras of this class are subdivided into three main groups: non-dual tantras (gnyis med kyi rgyud), mother tantras (ma’i rgyud), and father tantras (pha’i rgyud). The mother tantras emphasize wisdom (prajñā, shes rab), while the father tantras emphasize method or skillful means (upāya, thabs), and a third category, non-dual tantras—placed above the other two—emphasize the union of wisdom and means.

The elements taught in different tantras, and statements made in them, have been used by Tibetan scholars in a variety of ways to classify them into these three groups, which were probably never explicitly recognized or defined in India. Nor, indeed, did Tibetan scholars always agree on the categories concerned, as can be seen from the differences even between the Kangyur and Tengyur in the way individual tantra cycles are placed by their editors in their respective catalogues (dkar chag).

For further details on the Tibetan tradition’s classification of tantras, see:

Jamgön Kongtrul (’jam mgon kong sprul blo gros mtha’ yas), shes bya kun khyab, Delhi: Shechen Publications (1997), section 6, chapter 4. Translated as Guarisco, E. and McLeod, I (trans.), The Treasury of Knowledge: Book 6, Part 4, Systems of Buddhist Tantra, Ithaca: Snow Lion Publications (2005), especially chapters 2 and 15.

Tsongkhapa, A Lamp to Illuminate the Five Stages, tr. Kilty, Gavin. Library of Tibetan Classics; Boston: Wisdom Publications (2013). Chapter Two, “The Two Types of Tantra,” discusses different views on the division of tantras into “mother” (wisdom) and “father” (method) types.

outline:node.outline:name: Non-dual tantra
gnyis med rgyud/
outline:node.outline:description: Commentaries and liturgical works related to the tantras of Hevajra and Kālacakra (Toh 1180-1400)

Non-dual tantra

This initial subsection on non-dual tantra—and thus the whole tantra section of the Tengyur—gives pride of place to works related to the Hevajratantra (Toh 1180-1345), as Zhuchen Tsültrim Rinchen in his Degé Tengyur catalogue (dkar chag) follows the view that the Hevajra should be classified as a non-dual tantra. This is in contrast to the order in the Kangyur, where it is found among the “mother” or wisdom tantras. The extensive Hevajra commentaries and liturgies here fill nine volumes of the Tengyur.

The next group of works on non-dual tantra, filling over four volumes, are those of the Kālacakratantra (Toh 1346-1394), including not only the treatises and liturgical works but also the abridged root tantra itself (Toh 1346) and its commentary, the Vimalaprabhā, also found in the Kangyur.

This section also includes a small group of works on the Mañjuśrīnāmasaṃgīti, which heads the non-dual tantra section in the Kangyur (and is considered by some traditions to be related to the Kālacakra). Other works on this tantra are found in the Skillful means tantra subdivision, in the Yoga tantra section, and in the “Other works on tantra” collections.

outline:node.outline:name: Wisdom tantra
shes rab kyi rgyud/
outline:node.outline:description: Commentaries and liturgical works related to the mother tantras, centered on a range of deities divided into six main families (Toh 1401-1783)

Wisdom tantra

Wisdom, or “mother” tantras (ma’i rgyud), are a subset of Unexcelled Yoga tantras in which, it is said, the emphasis is on wisdom more than skillful means, the profound more than the vast, seeing the deity as the channels, energies and essences more than as the aggregates, elements, and sense-fields, relying more on the practice of gtum mo and bliss than on practices of the channels and energies, and in which female deities are more numerous than male. They are often also called yoginī tantras (rnal ’byor ma’i rgyud).

The 383 Tengyur works placed in this category by the dkar chag are here divided for convenience into two groups:

I. the 206 works on the tantras related to Śaṃvara or Cakrasaṃvara and his consort Vajrayoginī or Vajravārāhī (Toh 1401-1606); and

II. the 177 works on the other wisdom tantras, those of Catuḥpīṭha, Mahāmāyā, Vajrāmṛta, Buddhakapāla, Buddhasamayoga, and Tāra (Toh 1607-1783).

outline:node.outline:name: Śaṃvara and related tantras
bde mchog gi rgyud skor/
outline:node.outline:description: Commentaries and liturgical works related to mother or yoginī tantras centered on Śaṃvara / Cakrasaṃvara and Vajravārāhī or Vajrayoginī (Toh 1401-1606)

Śaṃvara and related tantras

The 206 works in this subdivision (Toh 1401-1606), filling almost 9 volumes of the Degé Tengyur, are all on the cycle of tantras centered on Śaṃvara (bde mchog), also called Cakrasaṃvara (khor lo sdom pa) in many of them, and often referred to as Heruka.

While placing this group in the overall heirarchy of the four levels of tantra—that is to say, within the fourth level, Unexcelled Yoga tantra, on the second level of three (i.e. the wisdom or “mother” tantras)—the dkar chag mentions the classification used in the Laghuśaṃvara (bde mchog nyung ngu, Toh 368, the root tantra of the cycle) whereby it is seen as constituting the sixth of six levels of tantra (rgyud sde sgo drug pa) known as “ultimate secret yoga tantra” (rnal ’byor gsang mtha’i rgyud).

The first 24 works (Toh 1401-1424) are described in the dkar chag as commentaries on the tantras of the cycle.

The next 115 works (Toh 1425-1540) are mainly liturgical works in which the male deity predominates.

These are followed by 66 works (Toh 1541-1606) centered on Vajravārāhī or Vajrayoginī.

The summary for the cycle in the dkar chag gives figures of 118 and 67 works in these last two groups, respectively. This may perhaps be accounted for by the grouping of more than one work under a single title, but warrants investigation.

outline:node.outline:name: Other wisdom tantras
shes rab kyi rgyud skor sna tshogs/
outline:node.outline:description: Commentaries and liturgical works related to the Catuḥpīṭha, Mahāmāyā, Vajrāmṛta, Buddhakapāla, Buddhasamayoga, and Tāra mother or yoginī tantras, to mother tantra in general, Avalokiteśvara, Mahākāla amd Acala (Toh 1607-1783)

Other wisdom tantras

Following the large group of works on the Śaṃvara cycle of wisdom tantra (see previous section) come ten further groups, together occupying 3½ volumes of the Degé Tengyur:

I. The 15 works on the Catuḥpīṭha (dpal gdan bzhi, Toh 1607-1621), of which the first 3 (Toh 1607-1609) are commentaries on the tantra, and the remaining 12 (Toh 1610-1621) are sādhanas of the male and female deities, maṇḍala rituals, works on the perfection stage, etc.

II. The 27 works on Mahāmāyā (sgyu ’phrul chen mo, Toh 1622-1648), of which the first 4 (Toh 1622-1625) are commentaries, and the remaining 23 (Toh 1626-1648) mainly liturgical works.

III. The 3 works on Vajrāmṛta (rdo rje bdud rtsi, Toh 1649-1651), all of which are commentaries on the tantra.

IV. The 7 works on Buddhakapāla (sangs rgyas thod pa, Toh 1652-1658), of which the first 3 (Toh 1652-1654) are commentaries.

V. The 24 works on Buddhasamayoga (sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor, Toh 1659-1682), of which the first 5 (Toh 1659-1663) are commentaries on the tantra.

VI. The 64 works on Tāra (sgrol ma) from an Unexcelled yoga tantra perspective, (Toh 1683-1743). The dkar chag counts 63 works here.

VII. A group of 6 works related to mother tantra in general (ma rgyud spyi dang ’brel pa, Toh 1744-1749).

VIII. Two works (Toh 1750-1751) on the Padmajālatantra (pad+ma dra ba, i.e. the Avalokiteśvarapadmajālamūlatantra, Toh 681, the root tantra of Avalokiteśvara found in the Kangyur classified among the Action tantras).

IX. The 30 works on Mahākāla in accordance with mother tantra (ma rgyud dang phyogs mthun pa mgon po nag po’i skor, Toh 1752-1781).

X. Finally, 2 works on Acala (mi g.yo ba, Toh 1782-1783).

outline:node.outline:name: Skillful means tantra
thabs rgyud/
outline:node.outline:description: Commentaries and liturgical works related to the father tantras, centered on a range of deities in six main groups (Toh 1784-2216)

Skillful means tantra

Skillful means, or “father” tantras (pha’i rgyud), are a subset of Unexcelled Yoga tantras in which, it is said, the emphasis is on skillful means more than on wisdom, the vast more than the profound, seeing the deity as the aggregates, elements, and sense-fields more than the the channels, energies and essences, practicing the perfection stage using principally the energies and channels rather than the essences, and in which male deities are more numerous than female.

The 436 Tengyur works placed in this category by the dkar chag are here divided for convenience into two groups:

I. The 135 works on the tantras related to Guhyasamāja (Toh 1784-1917); and

II. The 301 works on the other skillful means tantras, those related to Yamāri, Vajrabhairava, Mañjuśrīnāmasaṃgīti, Ekajaṭa, and Vajrapāṇi (Toh 1918-2216).

outline:node.outline:name: Guhyasamāja and related tantras
thabs rgyud gsang 'dus skor/
outline:node.outline:description: Commentaries and liturgical works related to father tantras centered on Guhyasamaja (Toh 1784-1917)

Guhyasamāja and related tantras

The 135 works in this subsection (Toh 1784-1917), filling 18 volumes of the Degé Tengyur, are all related to the tantras of the Guhyasamāja cycle.

The dkar chag classifies them in terms of the several Indian commentarial schools, notably those following Nāgārjuna (and Āryadeva), and those following Jñānapāda (also known as Buddhaśrījñāna).

I. The 59 works representing those who follow Lord Nāgārjuna (mgon po klu sgrub kyi rjes su ’brang ba’i skor), also known as the tradition of the Ārya or Noble Ones (’phags lugs) include:

a) The 12 principal commentaries themselves (Toh 1784-1795).

b) The 30 liturgies, maṇḍala rituals, instructions, and so forth related to them (Toh 1796-1825); Toh 1796 and 1797, both by Nāgārjuna, are the best known works explaining the generation stage practices, while Nāgārjuna’s works Toh 1800 and 1801 (the verse and prose versions of his Bodhicittavivaraṇa) and 1802 (the Pañcakrama), and Āryadeva’s Toh 1803 (Caryāmelāpakapradīpa, a commentary on the Pañcakrama), are important texts on the perfection stage yogas.

c) The 17 commentaries on these liturgies, etc. (Toh 1826-1842).

II. The 65 works representing those who follow Master Jñānapāda (slob dpon ye shes zhabs kyi rjes su ’brang ba’i skor, the school being known as ye shes zhabs lugs; the dkar chag counts 67) include:

a) The 10 commentaries on the individual tantras (Toh 1843-1852);

b) The 13 general instructions, etc. (Toh 1853-1865);

c) The 2 commentaries on those general instructions (Toh 1867-1868);

d) The 40 liturgies, maṇḍala rituals, instructions, and so forth related to them (Toh 1869-1908).

III. The 5 works representing those who follow Master Vajrahasa and others (slob dpon rdo rje bzhad pa la sogs pa’i skor, the school being known as bzhad pa’i lugs, Toh 1909-1913). The dkar chag states that the first four were, in the past, often attributed to the Jñānapāda tradition, but are incompatible with it.

IV. The 3 works representing those who follow Bhadrapāda (bzang po zhabs kyi rjes su ’brang ba’i skor, Toh 1914-1916). The dkar chag again notes that these works were, in the past, included in the Jñānapāda tradition, but that Smṛtijñānakīrti, who translated all three and authored the first two, followed Bhadrapāda’s school.

V. The single work from Ānandagarbha’s tradition (kun dga’ snying po’i lugs, Toh 1917), a commentary on the difficult points of the tantra.

Exposition of Bodhicitta
bodhicittavivaraṇa

Exposition of Bodhicitta
bodhicittavivaraṇa

outline:node.outline:name: Other skillful means tantras
thabs rgyud skor sna tshogs/
outline:node.outline:description: Commentaries and liturgical works related to father tantras centered on Yamāri, Vajrabhairava, Mañjuśrīnāmasaṃgīti, Ekajaṭa, and Vajrapāṇi (Toh 1918-2216)

Other skillful means tantras

The 301 works in this subsection, taking up some five volumes of the Degé Tengyur, are related to seven further cycles of skillful means (or father) tantras other than the Guhysamāja works, which were grouped in the preceding subsection.

I. The 172 works related to Yamāri (or Yamantaka) and Vajrabhairava (the dkar chag counts 180, probably by counting separately some multi-part liturgical works that the Tōhoku catalogue treats as a single text), in six subgroups:

a) the 52 works related to Black Yamāri (gshin rje gshed nag po, Toh 1918-1969); the dkar chag counts 54. The first 5 works (Toh 1918-1922) are commentaries, and the remaining 47 (Toh 1923-1969) are liturgical works and other instructions;

b) the 44 works related to Vajrabhairava (rdo rje ’jigs byed, Toh 1970-2013); the dkar chag counts 47. The first 5 works are commentaries, and the remaining 39 are liturgical works and other instructions;

c) the 3 works related to Six-Faced Yamāri (gshin rje gshed gdong drug pa, Toh 2014-2016); the dkar chag counts 4;

d) the 70 works related to Red Yamāri (gshin rje gshed dmar po, Toh 2017-2086); the dkar chag counts 72. Included here is a set of 36 sādhanas (Toh 2047-2083) by Prajñārakṣita (shes rab skyong);

e) the 3 works related to Yamakālāyuṣpāti (gshin rje gshed tshe bdag nag po, Toh 2087-2089).

II. The 32 works related to the Mañjuśrīnāmasaṃgīti (’jam dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod pa, Toh 2090-2121) elucidated according to Unexcelled Yoga tantra; the dkar chag counts 33. The first 5 works are commentaries, and the remaining 27 (or 28) are liturgical works and other instructions. Note that other works on this tantra are found in the Non-dual tantra subdivision of this Unexcelled Yoga group, in the Yoga tantra section, and in the “Other works on tantra” collections.

III. The 25 works related to Ekajaṭā (bde chen ral gcig, Toh 2122-2146). The dkar chag (which counts 26 works here) mentions that some of these tantras might seem to be better classified as mother tantras, but have been traditionally placed here. It also appears to describe Ekajaṭā as an Unexcelled Yoga form of Avalokiteśvara, and this group of works includes several sādhanas of the various forms of Avalokiteśvara and Hayagrīva as well as works related to Amitāyus.

IV. The 70 works related to Vajrapāṇi (phyag na rdo rje, Toh 2147-2216) elucidated according to Unexcelled Yoga tantra.

outline:node.outline:description: 'phags pa 'jams dpal gyi rtog pa thams cad bsdus par 'gyur pa/ rdo rje rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga zhib mo las/ slob dpon dpal ldan sgeg pa'i rdo rje yis/ /las dang dngos grub cho ga zhib mo slob dpon rigs pa bzang pos de la phan pa'i le'u gcig mdzad pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal u pa ya shrI mi tra dang / rong zom chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur te gtan la phab pa

outline:node.outline:title: gshin rje gshed nag po gdong drug pa'i 'khor lo'i bsgrub thabs
krisnayamarimukhasatcakrasadhana
krisnayamarimukhasatcakrasadhana-nama
outline:node.outline:description: dpal gshin rje gshed nag po gdong drug pa'i 'khor lo'i bsgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa/ /slob dpon de ba A ka ra tsan d+ras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po de ba A ka ra tsan+dra de nyid dang / /cog ro ban+de shes rab bla mas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa

outline:node.outline:description: dpal o rgyan gyis yul nas byung ba grub pa'i 'khor lo ji ltar rnyed pa klu'i byang chub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i sgrub thabs

outline:node.outline:title: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs

no sanskrit

outline:node.outline:title: shin tu spros pa med pa de kho na nyid kyi man ngag
sunisprapancatattvopedeca
sunisprapancatattvopedeca-nama
outline:node.outline:description: shin tu spros pa med pa'i de kho na nyid kyi man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon dpal ldan mthu stobs kyi mgon po thugs spros pa med pa'i dbyings las ma g.yos bzhin du/ sku'i spros pa dpag tu med pas gdug pa can tshar gcod cing / /bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos su byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po bi rU pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bstan pa bsrung pa'i lha rnams kyi bu gcig pa ltar bskyangs pas rgyal po gzhan gyi phyir rgol bas glags lta bar mi nus pa'i ljongs chos kyis rgyal po'i sku mkhar nyi ma gzugs su/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dngos grub brnyes pa dpal dar+pan A tsA r+ya dang/ glo bo lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga
raktayamarisadhanavidhi
outline:node.outline:description: dpal dpa' bo'i rgyal pos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal snga nas dang / chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa

outline:node.outline:title: gshin rje gshed kyi phrul 'khor gyi phreng ba
yamariyantravali
outline:node.outline:description: dpal o rgyan nas 'byung ba gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud chen 'bum phrag gsum pa las byung ba slob dpon bi ru pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta dpal mkhas pa chen po dA na shI las/ yul dbus kyi grub pa thob pa'i gnas drang srong srin po rir bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs
sriraktayamarisadhana
outline:node.outline:description: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs/ paN+Di ta chen po rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug phyag rgya chen po grub pa/ grub thob kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po rje btsun nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal snga nas dang / lo tsA ba chag dge slong chos rje dpal gyis gus pas mnyan nas/ mang yul gyi bzo gnas chen por bsgyur cing zhus btan la phab pa

outline:node.outline:title: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
sriraktayamarimandalopayika
outline:node.outline:description: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga paN+Di ta chen po rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta rje btsun chen po dpal gshin rje gshed kyis rjes su gzung ba/ nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal snga nas/ chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: rnal 'byor bzhi'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba rang byin gyis brlabs pa'i man ngag
caturyogatattva-svadhisthanopadeca
caturyogatattva-nama-svadhisthanopadeca
outline:node.outline:description: rnal 'byor bzhi'i de kho na nyid ces bya bar rang byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag grub thob kyis 'khor los sgyur ba mthu stobs la mngal brnyes pa/ dpal ldan rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bram ze dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /darpaN A tsaR+Ya dang / glo bo lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs
raktayamarisadhana
raktayamarisadhana-nama
outline:node.outline:description: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs/slob dpon chen po dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /lha'i skad la legs par zhugs pa'i shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa/ dpal thar pa'i gling gi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o

gshin rje gshed dmar po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho ga
raktayamaribalividhi

outline:node.outline:title: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i gtor ma'i cho ga
raktayamaribalividhi
outline:node.outline:description: gtor ma'i cho ga slob dpon dpal 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun chen po nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer dang / chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs
raktayamarisadhana
outline:node.outline:description: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sgrub pa'i thabs dpal rnam par snang mdzad srung bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun chen po nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal snga nas/ chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i mngon par rtogs pa

outline:node.outline:description: rang byin gyi brlabs pa'i rim pa man ngag dang bcas pa gshin rje gshed dmar po'i mngon par rtogs pa rdzogs so//slob dpon chen po mkhas shing dngos grub brnyes pa blo gros bzang pos mdzad pa/ paN+Di ta chen po bla ma rje btsun nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyis zhal snga nas/ gus pas mnyan nas chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i 'khor lo'i de kho na nyid kyi gsal byed
raktayamariyantratattvanirdecaka

outline:node.outline:title: gshin rje dgra dmar po'i sgrub thabs
raktayamarisadhana
raktayamarisadhana-nama
outline:node.outline:description: slob dpon chen po blo bzang snying po zhabs kyis mdzad pa'i gshin rje'i dgra dmar po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /lha'i skad la legs par zhugs pa'i shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyis gdan sa dpal thar pa gling gi gtsug lag khang du bsgrubs pa'o/ /gshin rje dgra dmar yon tan 'byung gnas sgrub thabs chos/ /rgya gar dpe 'di bod kyis mi rtogs pas/ /dam pa se tsa'i rig 'dzin skad gnyis pa/ /chos kyi bzang po'i dpe las gus par bsgyur/ /sa'i steng na nyi zla ltar gyur cig/

outline:node.outline:title: gshin rje mthar byed dmar po'i byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa

outline:node.outline:title: lha mo 'od 'dzin ma'i byin gyis brlab pa

outline:node.outline:title: gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs

outline:node.outline:description: bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i sgrub thabs lam gyi snying po zhes bya ba mkhas shing grub pa brnyes pa'i rnal 'byor pa chen po bud+d+ha dz+nyA na pA das/ ug ya na 'bar ba'i phug tu DA kI shA ri badz+ra wA rA hI nyid las dngos grub thob nas lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas yi ger byas pa rdzog so/ /yul dbus kyi paN+Di ta A nan+ta b+ha dra dang bod kyi lo tsA ba se tsha bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis grong khyer chen po ti ra ha te'i lho phyogs rang byung gi mchod rten rnam par dag pa'i drung du yul dbus kyi dpe dang mthun par bsgyur zhing bcos te gtan la phab pa/ /slar yang grub thob kar+Na shrI'i zhal snga nas gnas brtan nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyis shrI nA len dra'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag
traidhakayavakcittadhisthanopadeca-nama
traidhakayavakcittadhisthanopadesha-nama
outline:node.outline:description: slob ma rjes su gzung ba lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab pa'i man ngag slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /yul dbus kyi paN+Di ta A nan+da b+ha dra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba se tsha bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis grong khyer chen po ti ra ha te'i lho phyogs rang byung gi mchod rten rnam par dag pa'i drung du yul dbus kyi dpe dang mthun par bsgyur ci.inga bcos te gtan la phab pa'o/ /slar yang grub thob kar+Na shrI'i zhal snga nas mnyan te/ thar pa lo tsA ba gnas brtan nyi ma rgyal mtshan gyis shrI na lan+da'i gtsug lag khang chen por dag par bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: sems dpa' gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pa
traisattvasamadhisamathita
traisattvasamadhisamathita-nama

outline:node.outline:title: 'jam dpal mtshan brjod kyi don gsal bar byed pa

outline:node.outline:title: mtshan brjod nye bar bsdus pa'i rnam par rtog ge

namasamgityupasamharavitarka-nama
outline:node.outline:description: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i nye bar bsdus pa rnam par rtog ge zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po nges par sbyangs pa dpal gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po shrI badz+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dpyal ser tsa bsod nams rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o/ /byang chung sems dapa'i rnam 'phrul gyis/ /gnas mchog sman lung gtsug lag khang / /rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i skal ldan mang / /de dag don du legs par bsgyur//

outline:node.outline:title: 'jam dpal gyi rtsa sngags don rnam gzigs dang nye bar bsdus pa'i rnam par rtog ge gnyis kyi don bsdus pa'i mtshan gyi sgron ma
outline:node.outline:description: 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba khri drug stong pa ting 'dzin dra ba'i le'u las/ 'phags pa mtshan yang dag par brjod pa phan yon dang bcas pa'i bshad pa/ nor bu'i gling du 'khrungs pa dpal ldan byang chub mchog gi skal pa can/ dpal sna tshogs gzungs kyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa/ sngags don rnam par gzigs pa dang / de'i rjes su 'brangs pa slob dpon chen po gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa/ nye bar bsdus pa'i rnam par rtog ge dang sbyar ba'i bsdus don mtshan gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /pradz+nyA gu rus mdzad do

dpal ral gcig ma'i sgrub thabs
sri-ekajatisadhana
outline:node.outline:description: dpal ral pa cig ma'i sgrub thabs 'khor lo gnod sbyin dang bcas pa rdzogs so/ /rje grub thob chen po'i thugs dam/ gnubs lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: bsngo ba nor bu'i sgron ma
manyalokaparinamana
manyalokaparinamana-nama
outline:node.outline:description: rdo rje thogs pa'i bsngo ba nor bu'i sgron ma/ slob dpon mi pham zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta su b+ha shrI shAn+ti dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: ral pa gcig pa la bstod pa
dpal bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa la bstod pa
sribhagavadekajatastotra
outline:node.outline:description: bcom ldan 'das dpal ral pa gcig pa la bstod pa/ kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po bud+d+ha shrI b+ha dra dang bod kyi lo chung gnubs byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: rang gi sems ngal so ba'i man ngag tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu rtsa lnga pa
svacittavicramopadecapancavimcatikagatha
svacittavicramopadecapancavimcatikagatha-nama
outline:node.outline:description: rnal 'byor pa rang gi sems ngal sos par byed pa'i man ngag tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba de kho na nyid rnal du mtshon par byed pa'i do ha rdzogs so/ /jo bo spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug las man ngag gi tshigs su bcad pa nyid dngos su gsan nas grub pa brnyes pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI dza ga mi tra A nan+da dang / lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis dpal gu lang gser khang gi nags khrod aM ba ra pa ra ta'i bsil khang du bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: rtogs pa brjod pa sum cu pa
trimcatyavadana
outline:node.outline:description: rtogs pa brjod pa sum cu pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po mi tra dzo ki de nyid kyi spyan sngar gnubs lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: kha sar+pA Na yab yum gyi sgrub thabs
dpal kha sar+pA Na yab yum gyi sgrub thabs
srikhasarpanapitrimatrisadhana
outline:node.outline:description: dpal 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi sgrub thabs/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI me tra'i gdams pa rdzogs so/ /gnubs lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: gnod sbyin spun gnyis kyi sgrub thabs
sridvayabhratriyaksasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: dpal gnod sbyin spun gnyis kyi sgrub thabs/ slob dpon a dzi ta mi tras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug mi tra A nan+da'i 'phrin las kyi lha'i rigs gnubs lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i sgrub thabs kyi snang ba
kulalokanathasadhanamaloka
kulalokanathasadhanamaloka-nama
outline:node.outline:description: dpal ldan rje btsun rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i sgrub thabs kyi snang ba rje btsun ma hi mas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+harmA d+ha ra dang / yar lungs pa grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis dpal ldan sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: lnga bcu pa'i bshad pa
pancacikatippani
outline:node.outline:description: 'di ni rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i lnga bcu pa'i 'grel pa mdor bsdus pa ste/ kha che'i paN+Di ta dri med dpal bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang du mi chen lha rje ma ga ling gis zhus shing / yar lungs pa shud ke grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: ku la lo ka nA tha'i byin rlabs dang rjes gnang bya ba'i rim pa
outline:node.outline:description: ku la lo ka nA tha'i byin rlabs dang rjes gnang bya ba'i rim pa kha che'i paN+Di ta bi ma la shrI'i zhal snga nas bris pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug bsgom pa'i rim pa
outline:node.outline:description: rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug bsgom pa'i rim pa paN+Di ta chen po bi ma la shrI'i zhal nas 'byung ba bzhin bris pa 'di rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: spyan ras gzigs rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i rjes gnang gi cho ga

kulalokanathaya
outline:node.outline:description: ku la lo ka nA tha'i byin rlabs dang rjes gnang bya ba'i rim pa kha che'i paN+Di ta bi ma la shrI'i zhal snga nas bris pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: rig pa'i dbang
outline:node.outline:description: lo tsA ba blo brtan gyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrub pa'i thabs
kulalokecvarasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon b+h+ri ng+gi ra bram zes mdzad pa 'jam dpal sgeg pas bsgyur ba rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yi ge bdun pa'i sgrub thabs

aryavolokitecvarasaptaksarasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: dpal spyan ras gzigs yi ge bdun pa'i sgrub thabs/ /gnubs lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: thugs rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba'i man ngag gi rab tu byed pa
dpal thugs rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba'i man ngag gi rab tu byed pa
mahakarunikabhiseka-prakaranopadesa
sri-mahakarunikabhiseka-prakaranopadesa-nama
outline:node.outline:description: spyan ras gzigs kyi rgyud pad+ma zab pa dang pad+ma rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i rab tu byed pa 'di/ dpal dzA lan+dA ra pas mdzad pa'o/ /mnga' bdag mai tri pa'i phyag dpe las/ rgya gar phyag na'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba pra dz+nyA kirtis bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: 'jig rten dbang phyug gsang ba'i sgrub thabs
'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gsang ba'i sgrub thabs
outline:node.outline:description: ma gcig grub pa'i rgyal mo nas brgyud pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
aparamitayujanamandalabhita
aparamitayujanamandalabhita-nama
outline:node.outline:description: bcom ldan 'das mgon po tshe dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzang po yongs bzung zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta zla ba bzang po dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba glan dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur zhing zhus te dag par byas so

outline:node.outline:title: rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs
hayagrivasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: dpa' bo rta mgrin sgrub pa'i thabs/ /'od dpag med kyis lung bstan pa'i/ /mkha' 'gro grub pa'i rgyal mos brtsams/ /dge bas rta mchog sku thob shog /paN+Di ta zla ba bzang po dang glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus te dge'o

outline:node.outline:title: tshe dpag med kyi sgrub thabs
tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs
aparimitayurjnanasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta zla ba bzang po dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba glan dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: tshe dpag tu med pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga
aparimitayurhomavidhi
aparimitayurhomavidhi-nama
outline:node.outline:description: sbyin sreg las kyi 'bras 'byin 'di/ /mkha' 'gro grub pa'i rgyal mos brtsams/ /dge ba 'di yis 'gro ba kun/ /tshe dpag med pa rnyed 'gyur shog/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po wa la tsan+d+ra bla ma dang / lo tsA ba glan dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i sgrub thabs
aparimitayurjnanasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma grub pa'i rgyal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga

bhavadyaparitayujanamandalabiddhi
bhavadyaparitayujanamandalabiddhi-nama
outline:node.outline:description: bcom ldan 'das mgon po tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i dbang bzhi bskur ba'i cho ga'i las khrigs 'chi med ye shes bdud rtsi'i bum pa zhes bya ba/ ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma grub pa'i rgyal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: phyag rdor gos sngon po can drag po gsum 'dul rgyud kyi 'grel pa
'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa
aryanilambaradharavajrapanirudratrivinitanamatantravritti
outline:node.outline:description: drag po gsum 'dul zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyis 'grel pa bdud rtsi myu gu zhes bya ba/ dngos grub brnyes pa'i dzA pa ri pas sa ba ri ba la man ngag tu zhus pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de nyid dang / paN+Di ta de ba pu nya ma ti dang / lo tsA ba chos kyis bzang pos bsgrur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: phyag rdor sgrub thabs 'khor lo chen po

nilambaradharavajrapanimahayaksakalapamahacakrasadhana-nama
outline:node.outline:description: slob dpon chen po dzA ba ri pas mdzad pa'i sgrub thabs 'khor lo chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de ba pur+Na ma ti dang / lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi sgrub thabs bdud rtsi thigs pa

outline:node.outline:title: yi dwags dang sha za dang grul bum dang srul po rnams rnam par sbyong zhing sel ba'i sgrub thabs

outline:node.outline:title: phyag na rdo rje'i gzungs kyi gtor ma'i cho ga

outline:node.outline:name: General Unexcelled Yoga tantra works
bla med rgyud spyi’i dgongs ’grel/
outline:node.outline:description: Commentaries on the Unexcelled Yoga tantras in general (Toh 2217-2502)

General Unexcelled Yoga works

The next 286 works (Toh 2217-2502, filling 4 volumes) are described in the dkar chag as belonging to the group of commentaries on Unexcelled Yoga tantra in general (rnal ’byor bla na med pa’i rgyud spyi’i dgongs ’grel gyi skor), dealing with the view, meditation, action, and fruit.

That description seems to apply particularly to the first 46 works (Toh 2217-2262) on a variety of topics related to tantra practice.

These are followed by a series of 52 works (Toh 2263-2314) that teach Mahāmudrā, including songs (dohā) by Saraha, Tilopa, Nāropa, and Virūpa.

The following 11 works (Toh 2315-2325) are a group of pith-instructions on the tradition of “Pacifying” (zhi byed).

The topics of the remaining 177 works (Toh 2326-2502) in this section are not clearly set out in the dkar chag, although the first few works appear to belong to a group on the development stage (bskyed rim gyi skor) whose end is not marked. The verse conclusion of the section mentions that these texts deal with the view and practice of Unexcelled Yoga tantra, the meaning of empowerment, the vows and samayas, gaṇacakra, consecration, and so forth.

outline:node.outline:description: dbu ma drug pa zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa mai tris mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bla ma badz+ra pA Ni dang / nags tshos bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: lta ba ngan pa sel ba'i dka' 'grel
lta ba ngan sel dka' 'grel
kudristinirghatacinata
outline:node.outline:description: lta ba ngan pa sel ba'i dka' 'grel dpal ldan nges par sbyangs pa gnyis su med pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /badz+ra pA Ni dang mtshur gyis bsgyur ba yin no

outline:node.outline:title: lhan cig skyes pa drug pa
sahajasat-ka
outline:node.outline:description: lhan cig skyes pa drug pa bla ma mai tri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bla ma badz+ra pA Ni dang mtshur gyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: rmi lam nges par bstan pa
rmi lam nges par bstan pa
svapnanirdeca
outline:node.outline:description: rmi lam nges par bstan pa/ slob dpon gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bla ma badz+ra pA Ni dang / dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: sgyu ma nges par bstan pa
mayanirukti
mayanirukti-nama
outline:node.outline:description: sgyu ma nges par bstan pa slob dpon gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+ra pA Ni dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: rab tu mi gnas pa gsal bar ston pa
aprasahaprakaca
aprasahaprakaca-nama
outline:node.outline:description: rab tu mi gnas pa gsal bar ston pa/ slob dpon gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /badz+ra pA Ni dang / nags tshos bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: de kho na nyid bcu pa
tattvadacaka
tattvadacaka-nama
outline:node.outline:description: de kho na nyid bcu pa/ slob dpon gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bla ma phyag na dang / mtshur gyis bsgyur ba'o/ /phyis lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ro

outline:node.outline:title: zung du 'jug pa rab tu gsal ba bstan pa
yuganaddhaprakaca
yuganaddhaprakaca-nama
outline:node.outline:description: zung du 'jug pa rab tu gsal ba bstan pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon a ba d+hU tis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /badz+ra pA Ni dang / nags tshos bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: dga' gcugs lnga pa
prinapancaka
outline:node.outline:description: dga' gcugs lnga pa/ slob dpon mai tri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bla ma phyag na'i zhal snga nas dang / lo tsA ba rma ban gyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: mi phyed pa lnga pa
nirbhedapancaka
outline:node.outline:description: mi phyed pa lnga pa slob dpon mai tri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+ra pA Ni dang / lo tsA ba rma ban gyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: bde ba chen po gsal ba
mahasukhapradaca
outline:node.outline:description: bde ba chen po gsal ba slob dpon a ba d+hU ti pa dpal gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bla ma badz+ra pA Ni dang / rma ban gyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: de kho na nyid rin po che'i phreng ba
tattvaratnavali
tattvaratnavali-nama
outline:node.outline:description: de kho na nyid rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon a ba d+hU ti pa gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /nags tsho tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: de kho na nyid rab tu bstan pa
tattvaprakaca
tattvaprakaca-nama
outline:node.outline:description: de kho na nyid rab tu bstan pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgya rnam par bshad pa
pancatathagatamudravivarana
outline:node.outline:description: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i phyag rgya rnam par bshad pa slob dpon gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po phyag na rdo rje dang / lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: dbang gi dgos pa mdor bsdus pa
sekakaryasamgraha
outline:node.outline:description: dbang gi dgos pa mdor bsdus pa mkhas pa chen po nges par sbyangs pa gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma badz+ra pA Ni'i zhal snga nas dang / lo tsA ba mtshur ston gyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: dbang gi bya ba mdor bsdus pa
samksiptasekaprakriya
outline:node.outline:description: dbang gi cho ga mdor bsdus pa rdzogs so/ /dpal gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: rang bzhin lnga pa
pancasvabhava
outline:node.outline:description: 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin lnga pa/ dpal gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /a mri de bas zhus te gsol ba btab nas brtsams

outline:node.outline:title: thabs dang she rab rtse ba lnga pa
prajnopayadayapancaka
outline:node.outline:description: thabs dang she rab brtse ba lnga pa slob dpon a ba d+hU tI pa gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjesa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+ra pA Ni dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba mtshur dz+nyA na A ka ras bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: do hA ti zhes bya ba de kho na nyid kyi man ngag
dohanidhi-tattvopadeca
dohanidhi-nama-tattvopadeca
outline:node.outline:description: do hA ti zhes bya de kho na nyid kyi man ngag rdzogs so/ /a ba d+hU ti pas mdzad pa/ rje btsun d+hi ri shrI dz+nyA nas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: theg pa chen po nyi shu pa
mahayanavimcati
outline:node.outline:description: theg pa chen po nyi shu pa slob dpon gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /pa ri pa ta pradz+nyA sha ra sa ma d+h+ya na/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po de bA ka ra tsan+d+ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya brtson 'grus kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la dbab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: yid la mi byed pa ston pa
amanasikaroddeca
amanasikaroddeca-nama
outline:node.outline:description: yid la mi byed pa ston pa bdag med pa gsal ba slob dpon chen po gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+ra pA Ni dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba gnyan chung gis bcos pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: de kho na nyid theg pa pa chen po nyi shu pa
tattvamahayanavimcati
outline:node.outline:description: a ba d+hU tI pa gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rje btsun d+hi ri shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas dang / lo tsA ba seng kar shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: dbang bskr nges par bstan pa
sekanirdeca
sekanirdeca-nama
outline:node.outline:description: dbang bskur ba nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba slob dpon rgyal ba mai tri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na paN+Di ta dang/ lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur

outline:node.outline:title: dbang bskur nges bstan bka' 'grel
dbang bskur ba nges par bstan pa'i bka' 'grel
sekanirdecapanijika
outline:node.outline:description: dbang bskur ba nges par bstan pa'i bka' 'grel/ slob dpon dga' ba skyong gis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /sa man+ta b+ha dra dang / nag tshos bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: de kho na nyid bcu pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa
tattvadacakatika
outline:node.outline:description: de kho na nyid bcu pa'i rgya cher bshad pa paN+Di ta chen po slob dpon lhan cig skyes pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+ra pA Ni las mnyan te/ slad kyi paN+Di ta kA l+ya warma dang / lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong dz+nyA na A kA ra mtshur gyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: rdo rje'i tshig
vajrapada
vajrapada-nama
outline:node.outline:description: rdo rje slob dpon badz+ra pA Ni'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/ rdo rje'i tshig rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang / lo tsA ba mtshur ston dge slong dz+nyA na A ka ras bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: do ha mdzod kyi dka' 'grel
dohakosapanjika
outline:node.outline:description: do ha mdzod kyi dka' 'grel slob dpon chen po dpal gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar lho phyogs yul ko sa lar sku 'khrungs pa'i rnal 'byor pa chen po shrI bai ro tsa na badz+ras bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: mi zad pa'i gter mdzod yongs su gang ba'i glu'i rgya cher bshad pa
mi zad pa'i gter mdzod yongs su gang ba'i glu zhes bya ba gnyug ma'i de nyid rab tu ston pa'i rgya cher bshad pa
dohanidhikosaparipurangiti-nijatattvaprakacatika
dohanidhikosaparipurangiti-nama-nijatattvaprakacatika
outline:node.outline:description: mi zad pa'i gter mdzod yongs su gang ba'i glu zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyung chen po dpal sa ra ha pa'i dgongs pa mkhas par grags pa dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shrI dz+nyA na kIrtisa rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: do ha mdzod kyi dka' 'grel
dohakosapanjika
dohakosapanjika-nama
outline:node.outline:description: do ha mdzod kyi dka' 'grel slob dpon chen po thar pa'i 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po rgyal ba'i lha dang / rgya lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: phyag rgya bzhi'i rgya cher 'grel pa rin po che'i snying po
mudracaturatika-ratnahridaya
mudracaturatika-ratnahridaya-nama
outline:node.outline:description: phyag rgya bzhi'i rgya cher 'grel pa rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas par grags pa / bla ma b+hi ta karmasa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor pa bsod snyoms pa pradz+nyA shr dz+nyA na kIrtis rang 'gyur du byas pa'o/ /rje btsun b+hi ta karma de nyid mtshan nyid mdzad pa'i skabs su slob dpon chen po ka ro pa zhes kyang grags so/ /rnal 'byor mdzad pa'i skabs su/ dkar ro zan zhes bya bar grags so/ /spyod pa mdzad pa'i skabs su/ phyogs kyi gos can zhes bya bar grags so

outline:node.outline:title: lhan cig skyes grub
sahajasiddhi
outline:node.outline:description: lhan cig skyes grub rdzogs so/ rgya ga gyi mkhan po chen po zla ba mgon dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba shes rab grags kyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: lhan cig skyes grub kyi gzhung 'grel
sahajasiddhipaddhati
sahajasiddhipaddhati-nama
outline:node.outline:description: dpal u rgyan gyi yul du sku 'khrungs pa'i rgyal po in+d+ra bud d+hi zhes bya bas mdzad pa'i lhan cig skyes pa grub pa'i gzhung 'grel lhan lcam rje btsun ma dpal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ma nA bi ha ra la dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong pradz+nyA kIrtisa legs par mnyan nas bsgyur ba lags so

outline:node.outline:title: de kho na nyid grub pa
dpal de kho na nyid grub pa
critattvasiddhi
outline:node.outline:description: slob dpon chen po ke ra li pas mdzad pa de kho na nyid grub pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: do ha mdzod ces bya ba spyod pa'i glu
dohakosa-nama-caryagiti
outline:node.outline:description: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/ do ha mdzod ces bya ba spyod pa'i glu rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: mi zad pa'i gter mdzod man ngag gi glu
dohakosopadecagiti
dohakosopadecagiti-nama
outline:node.outline:description: snying po bla na med pa gtan la dbab pa do ha mdzod ces bya ba/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal sa ra ha pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+ra pA Ni dang / bla ma a sus zhus

outline:node.outline:title: do ha mdzod spyod pa'i glu'i 'grel pa don gyi sgron ma
do ha mdzad ces bya ba spyod pa'i glu'i 'grel pa don gyi sgron ma
dohakosanamacaryagititika-arthapradipa
dohakosanamacaryagititika-arthapradipa-nama
outline:node.outline:description: do ha mdzad ces bya ba'i spyod pa'i glu'i 'grel pa/ don gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po/ skye med bde chen gyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa/ rang 'gyur du bsgyur nas gtan la phab pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: ka kha'i do hA
kakhasya doha
kakhasya doha-nama
outline:node.outline:description: ka kha'i do ha zhes bya ba/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal bram ze chen pos sA ra ha'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa rdzogs so/ /yul ko sa lar sku 'khrungs pa'i bla ma rnal 'byor pa chen po bai ro tsa na badz+ra'i zhal snga nas rang 'gyur du gsungs pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: ka kha'i do ha'i bshad pa bris pa
kakhasya dohatippana
outline:node.outline:description: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi gtsug gi nor bu lta bu dpal sa ra has mdzad pa'i ka kha'i do ha'i bshad pa bris pa 'di/ rgya gar lho phyogs yul ko sA lar sku 'khrungs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI bai ro tsa na badz+ra'i zhal snga nas rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: do ha mdzod kyi snying po don gyi glu'i 'grel pa
dohakosahridaya-arthagitatika
dohakosahridaya-arthagitatika-nama
outline:node.outline:description: dus gsum bde gshegs rnams kyi dgongs pa mtshungs pa med pa la/ dpal ldan ri khrod pa yi dgongs pa nam mkha' nyid dang mtshungs/ gnyis med a ba d+hU ti'i dran pa 'ja' tshon 'dra pa des/ /do ha ko Sha'i don 'grel bris pas gong nas bzod par bzhes/ /snying gi pad+mo'i dkyil na gnas pa'i snying po'i don 'di ni/ /slob ma snying dang 'dra ba'i ngag gi nan gyis zhus nas su/ /'di la mos pa rnams kyi don du bdag gis 'di bsgyur bas/ /sems can ma lus snying po'i don 'di rtogs nas grol gyur cig

outline:node.outline:title: sku'i mdzod 'chi med rdo rje'i glu
kayakosa-amritavajragita
outline:node.outline:description: sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa/ sku'i mdzod 'chi med rdo rje'i glu zhes bya ba rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: gsung gi mdzod 'jam dbyangs rdo rje'i glu
vakkosa-rucirasvaravajragita
outline:node.outline:description: gsung gi mdzod 'jam dbyangs rdo rje'i glus sa ra has gsungs pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: thugs kyi mdzod skye med rdo rje'i glu
cittakosa-ajavajragita
outline:node.outline:description: thugs kyi mdzod skye med rdo rje'i glu snying po gsang ba'i don/ dpal sa ra ha pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: sku gsung thugs yid la mi byed pa
kayavakcittamnasikara
kayavakcittamnasikara-nama
outline:node.outline:description: sku gsung thugs yid la mi byed pa zhes bya pa'i phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas gnyis pa ltar grags pa/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal sa ra ha pa'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa rdzogs so/ /bla ma nag pos rang 'gyur du gnang ba'o/ /gu ya sa ma pa ta mi thi

outline:node.outline:title: do ha mdzod ces bya ba phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag
dohakosa-mahamudropadeca
dohakosa-nama-mahamudropadeca
outline:node.outline:description: do ha mdzod ces bya ba phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag dpal ri khrod pa chen po sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI bai ro tsa na rak+ShI tas rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: man ngag gi tshigs su bcad pa bcu gnyis pa
dvadacopadecagatha
outline:node.outline:description: man ngag gi tshigs su bcad pa bcu gnyis pa bram ze chen po sa ra ha'i zhal nas gsungs pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa
svadhisthanakrama
outline:node.outline:description: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal sa ra ha chen pos mdzad pa bdag byin gyis brlab pa grub pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po pa shAn+ta b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: de kho na nyid kyi man ngag rtse mo do ha'i glu
tattvopadecasikharadohagiti
tattvopadecasikharadohagiti-nama
outline:node.outline:description: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa/ phyag rgya chen po de kho na nyid kyi man ngag rtse mo do ha'i glu zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /kriSh+N paN+Di tas rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: dngos po sbyong ba
bhavasancara
bhavasancara-nama
outline:node.outline:description: dngos po sbyong zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+ra pA Ni dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang lnga'i 'grel pa
[sardhapancagatha]
outline:node.outline:description: slob dpon klu sgrub snying po'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang lnga zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /dpal gyi ri la mnga' bdag chen pos/ rje btsun ri khrod kyis gnag ba'o/ /des rje btsun ka ro pa la brgyud do/ /des rje btsun na ro pa la brgyud do

outline:node.outline:title: rnam par mi rtog pa'i rab tu byed pa
nirvikalpaprakarana
outline:node.outline:description: rnam par mi rtog pa'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon chen po Ar+ya de ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta che po ma hA kA ru Na dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: do ha mdzod
dohakosa
dohakosa-nama
outline:node.outline:description: do ha mdzod ces bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug birwa pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI bai ro tsa nas rang 'gyur du bsgyur ba'o/ /brgyud pa ni birwa pa/ nag po pa/ slob dpon sgra mkhan zhabs/ slob dpon pu ra pa/ shAi bai ro tsa na'o

outline:node.outline:title: do ha mdzod
dohakosa
outline:node.outline:description: slob dpon chen po te lo pas mdzad pa'i do ha mdzod ces bya ba rdzogs so/ rgya gar lho phyogs ko sA lar sku 'khrungs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po mkhas pa dpal rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje'i zhal snga nas rang 'gyur du gsungs pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa
pancasarga
pancasarga-nama
outline:node.outline:description: brtul zhugs spyod pa'i slob dpon chen po nag pos mdzad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: dpal birwa pa'i tshig rkang brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa
crivirupapadacaturaciti
outline:node.outline:description: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal bi rU pas mdzad pa'i tshig rkang brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so/ /yul lho phyogs ko sA lar sku 'khrungs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI bai ro tsa na badz+ra'i zhal snga rang 'gyur du mdzad nas gsungs pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i gdams ngag
lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa rtsa ba rdo rje'i tshig rkang
[margaphalanvitavavadaka]
outline:node.outline:description: lam zab bla ma dam tshig lus so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i gdams ngag dang man ngag du bcas pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: bdud rtsi grub pa'i rtsa ba
amritasiddhimula
amritasiddhimula-nama
outline:node.outline:description: bdud rtsi grub pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po bi rU pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po rnal 'byor pa las grub pa thob pa'i rgya gar e de bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: mkha' 'gro snyan brgyud gdung ba bcad pa'i gdams pa
mkha' 'gro ma'i man ngag snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa gdung ba bcad pa'i gdams pa
dakinyupadecacrotraparampara-pidacchedanavavadaka
dakinyupadecacrotraparampara-pidacchedanavavadaka-nama
outline:node.outline:description: mkha' 'gro ma'i gdams ngag snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa'i gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa zhes bya'o/ /spru pa'i rnal 'byor pas gzhung du bkod pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: phyag rgyal chen po rdo rje'i glu
mahamudravajragiti
mahamudravajragiti-nama
outline:node.outline:description: dpal sha ba ri dbang phyung dang / mkha' 'gro ma ye shes kyi spyan ma dang / pad+ma'i spyan gyi zhal snga nas snying po'i don mgur du bzhengs pa phyag rgya chen po'i rdo rje'i glu /brda brgyud gsang ba'i sgron ma rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: rdo rje'i glu
vajrageet
outline:node.outline:description: slob dpon chen po nA ro pa'i rdo rje'i glu rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: rdo rje'i glu
vajrageet
outline:node.outline:description: ma hA yo ga nA ro pa'i rdo rje'i glu rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: rdo rje'i glu
vajragiti
outline:node.outline:description: slob dpon nag po zhabs kyi rdo rje'i glu rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: grub thob brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i rtogs pa'i snying po
caturacitisiddhasambodhigridaya
caturacitisiddhasambodhigridaya-nama
outline:node.outline:description: grub thob brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i rtogs pa'i snying po slob dpon dpa' bo 'od gsal gyis phyogs gcig tu bsdus pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: spyod pa'i glu'i mdzod kyi 'grel pa
caryagitikosavritti
caryagitikosavritti-nama
outline:node.outline:description: spyod pa'i glu'i mdzod grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i glu de kho na nyid gsal bar shes pa'i skye bo rnams la slob dpon thub pas byin gyis 'grel pa mdzad pa las grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i glu 'grel pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po kIrti tsan+d+ra'i zhal snga nas gdams pa dang bcas pa legs par zhus shing / chos kyi rje dpal ldan sa skya pa khu dbon rnams kyi sku drin la brten nas bal yul yam bu'i grong khyer du bod kyi lo tsA ba ban+de grags pa rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ro

outline:node.outline:title: dngos po'i gnas lugs bsgom pa
mulaprakritisthabhavana-nama
no sanskrit
outline:node.outline:description: dngos po'i gnas lugs bsgom pa zhes bya ba/ nor bu gling pa'i slob dpon bde ba'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: phyag rgya bzhi'i man ngag
caturmudropadeca
caturmudropadeca-nama
outline:node.outline:description: phyag rgya bzhi'i man ngag slob dpon gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+ra pA Ni dang /bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: de kho na nyid tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyi 'grel pa
chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas par ston pa'i de kho na nyid tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyi 'grel pa
[sarvadharmaprasahadecakatattvardhagathavritti]
outline:node.outline:description: chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas par ston pa'i de kho na nyid tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyi 'grel pa dpal a wa d+hU ti'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: ma rtogs rtogs par byed pa
abodhibodhaka
outline:node.outline:description: ma rtogs pa rtogs par byed pa slob dpon chen po dpal gnyis med rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po phyag na rdo rje dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: snying po kun las btus pa'i rab tu byed pa
sarvasarasamuccayaprakarana
outline:node.outline:description: snying po kun nas btus pa'i rab tu byed pa/ slob dpon chen po shrI Anan+da badz+ra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+ra pA Ni dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: bsgom rim drug pa
bhavanakramasatka
bhavanakramasatka-nama
outline:node.outline:description: bsgom rim drug pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas gnyis pa ltar grags pa'i badz+ra pA Nisa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /lo tsA ba nag tshos bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: na mo budd+hA ya'i 'grel pa
nomobuddhaya-vritti
no sanskrit
outline:node.outline:description: na mo budd+hA ya'i 'grel pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: do ha mdzod
dohakosa
outline:node.outline:description: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po slob dpon nag po rdo rjes mdzad pa'i do ha mdzod ces bya ba rdzogs so/ /lho phyogs ko sa lar sku 'khrungs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug shrI bai ro tsa na badz+ra'i zhal snga nas rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: do ha mdzod kyi rgya cher 'grel pa
dpal nag po rdo rje zhabs kyi do ha mdzod kyi rgya cher 'grel pa
crikrisnagajrapadadohakosatika
outline:node.outline:description: dpal nag po rdo rje'i do ha mdzod kyi 'grel pa paN+Di ta 'od dpag med kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag
mahamudra-upadeca
outline:node.outline:description: dpal til+li pas nA ro pa la chu bo gang+gA'i 'gram du gsungs pa legs par rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: lta ba mdor bsdus pa
outline:node.outline:description: rje na ro pa'i lta ba mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /lo tsA ba mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: phyag rgya chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa
acintyamahamudra
acintyamahamudra-nama
rnal 'byor pa la gdams pa rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab pa
outline:node.outline:description: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug til+li pas go ri shar pa'i rgyal po'i khab tu rnal 'byor pa la gdams pa/ rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba i thi

outline:node.outline:title: mthu can la gdams pa phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa
outline:node.outline:description: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug til+li pas/ gyad kyi nor bu'i grong du mthu can la gdams pa/ phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba i thi

outline:node.outline:title: glu mkhan la gdams pa rol mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa
outline:node.outline:description: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug til+li pas/ 'dus pa rin po che'i tshong dus su glu mkhan la gdams pa/ rol mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba i thi

outline:node.outline:title: mu stegs pa la gdams pa chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa
outline:node.outline:description: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug til+li pas/ rgyal po seng grags seng ge'i sgo drung du mu stegs pa la gdams pa/ chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba i thi

outline:node.outline:title: shan pa la gdams pa bsod pa'i sbyor ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa
outline:node.outline:description: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug til+li pas/ rigs ngan gtum mo'i grong khyer du shan pa la gdams pa/ gsod pa'i sbyor ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba i thi

outline:node.outline:title: rig byed mkhan la gdams pasna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa
outline:node.outline:description: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug til+li pas/ grong khyer pad+ma can gyi rig byed mkhan la gdams pa/ sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba i thi

outline:node.outline:title: sgyu ma mkhan la gdams pa dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa
outline:node.outline:description: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug til+li pas/ grong khyer grags pa skyong du sgyu ma mkhan la gdams pa/ dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba rdzogs so/ /i thi/ sa ma pa tha

outline:node.outline:title: smad tshong ma la gdams pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bde ba
outline:node.outline:description: rnal ‘byor gyi dbang phyug til+li pas sgyu ma sprul pa’i grong khyerd du smad ‘tshong ma la gdams pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa’i bde ba chen po zhes bya ba i thi

outline:node.outline:title: 'khor ba las yid nges par 'byung ba'i glu
'khor ba las yid nges par 'byung bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i glu
samsaramanoniryanikaranamasamgiti
outline:node.outline:description: 'khor ba las yid ches par 'byung bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i glu/ slob dpon dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rgya brtson seng ges bi ka ma la shI la'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o/ /slad nas bla ma de nyid dang / lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bcos shing gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: chos kyi dbyings lta ba'i glu
dharmadhatudarcanagiti
outline:node.outline:description: chos kyi dbyings su lta ba'i glu /slob dpon chen po'i dI paM ka ras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: man ngag sku'i sgron ma
upadecakayapradipa
upadecakayapradipa-nama
outline:node.outline:description: man ngag sku'i sgrol ma rdzogs so

yanavakpradipa
yanavakpradipa-nama
outline:node.outline:description: theg pa gsung gi sgron ma rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: yang dag lta ba'i sgron ma
samdarcanapradipa
samdarcanapradipa-nama
outline:node.outline:description: yang dag lta ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: rin po che sgron ma
ratnabhavanapradipa
ratnabhavanapradipa-nama
outline:node.outline:description: man ngag bsgom pa'i sgron ma rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: mnyam nyid gzhi'i sgron ma
samatavastupradipa
samatavastupradipa-nama
outline:node.outline:description: mnyam nyid gzhi'i sgron ma rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: mthar thug 'bras bu'i sgron ma
kotinisthaphalapradipa
kotinisthaphalapradipa-nama
outline:node.outline:description: mthar thug 'bras bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba rje btsun ka ma la shI las mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: byang chub spyod pa'i sgron ma
bodhicaryapradipa
bodhicaryapradipa-nama
outline:node.outline:description: byang chub spyod pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba rje btsun ka ma la shI las mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta kha che dz+nyA na gu h+ya dang / ong po lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: rnal 'byor lam gyi sgrol ma
yogapathapradipa
yogapathapradipa-nama
outline:node.outline:description: sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa rnal 'byor lam gyi sgrol ma zhes bya ba rje btsun ka ma la shI las mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: gsang ba thugs kyi sgron ma
cittaguhyapradipa
cittaguhyapradipa-nama
outline:node.outline:description: sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa gsang ba thugs kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po ka ma la shI las mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gu h+ya dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba lo btsun chung gis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: maN+Dal gyi cho ga
mandalavidhi
mandalavidhi-nama
outline:node.outline:description: maN+Dal dbul ba'i cho ga rje btsun ka ma shI las mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: de kho na nyid phyag rgya chen po yi ge med pa'i man ngag
mahamudratattvanaksaropadeca
outline:node.outline:description: de kho na nyid phyag rgya chen po yi ge med pa'i man ngag rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po ka ma la shI las mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gu h+ya dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba bla ma lo btsun chung gis bsgyur cing zhus te btan la phab pa

outline:node.outline:title: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrub thabs
prajnaparamitasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrub thabs/ rje btsun ka ma la shI las mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrubs thabs
aryatarabhattarikasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: rje btsun ka ma la shI las mdzad pa'i sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs
vajravarahisadhana
outline:node.outline:description: rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs rje btsun ka ma la shI las mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: 'jam dpal khro bor sgrub pa
manjucrikrodhasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: 'jam dpal khro bor sgrub pa rje btsun ka ma la shI las mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: chos drug gi man ngag
saddharmopadesa
saddharmopadesa-nama
outline:node.outline:description: grub pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug til+li pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po nA ro paN+Di ta dang / mar pa lho brag pa chos kyi blo gros kyis/ kha che'i gnas puSh+pa ha rir bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: bka' yang dag pa'i tshad ma zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro ma'i man ngag
ajnasamyakpramana-nama-dakinyupadesa
rim pa lnga bsdus pa gsal ba
pancakramasarmgrahaprakasa
outline:node.outline:description: rim pa lnga'i don bsdus pa gsal ba zhes bya dpal ldan nA ro pas mdzad pa'i gsang ba'i man ngag bla ma'i zhal las rtogs par bya ba rdzogs so/ / paN+Di ta de nyid dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i lung rtogs kyi bstan pa phyogs dus thams cad du dar zhing rgyas par gyur cig

outline:node.outline:title: go bar byed pa snying po brgya pa
pratipattisaracataka
outline:node.outline:description: go bar byed pa snying po brgya pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po AR+Ya de ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /'di ni shar phyogs sad+na ga ra'i gnas brtan theg pa chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen mkhas pa la dngos grub kyi brgyan pa dpal nags kyi rin po che'i zhal snga nas man ngag gi bshad pas yang dag par gsungs pa'i sgra don ji lta ba bzhin du/ dge slong chos smra ba bsod nams rnam par rgyal ba dbang po'i sde zhes bya bas legs par bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: go bar byed pa'i snying po brgya pa rnam par bshad pa
pratipattisarashatakavivarana
pratipattisarashatakavivarana-nama
outline:node.outline:description: go bar byed pa'i snying po brgya pa rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba dpal he ru ka de ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar shar phyogs sad+na ga ri paN+Di ta chen po shrI ba na rat+na'i zhal sngar/ dge slong chos smra ba bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sde zhes bya bas dpal ngam ring gi yang rtser mnyan zhing bsgyur ba las/ phyis legs par brtags shing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: tshe sgrub pa'i thabs
ayuhsadhana
outline:node.outline:description: yo gI bi bud+d+ha ka ra'i man ngag ste/ rgya gar shar phyogs sad+na ga ra'i paN+Di ta chen po dpal nags kyi rin po che'i spyan sngar dge slong chos smra ba bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sdes bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: 'khor lo sdom pa'i man ngag snyan brgyud pa yid bzhin nor bu
dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i man ngag zhal nas snyan du brgyud pa yid bzhin nor bu
sri-cakrasamvaropadesamukhakarnaparamparacintamani-nama
outline:node.outline:description: yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang tshig til+li pas bkod pa rdzogs so/ /rtsigs kyi rgya bdud dang bcas pa nA ro paN+Di ta'i zhal snga nas dang / lo tsA ba mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyis puSh+pa ha ri'i gnas su bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: snyan rgyud rdo rje'i tshig rkang
karnatantravajrayaga
karnatantravajrayaga-nama
outline:node.outline:description: ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma la gdams pa/ snyan rgyud rdo rje'i tshig rkang rdzogs so/ /mkhas grub na ro paNa chen gyi zhal snga nas/ lo tsA ba mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyis puSh+pa ha ri'i gnas chen du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: bdag gi rnal 'byor
atmayoga
atmayoga-nama
outline:node.outline:description: bdag gi rnal 'byor zhes bya ba/ rtog rtse pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar shar phyogs sad+na ga ra'i mkhas pa chen po nags kyi rin chen gyi spyan sngar/ dge slong chos smra ba bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sdes bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: thams cad grub par byed pa
sarvasiddhikara
sarvasiddhikara-nama
outline:node.outline:description: las thams cad 'grub par byed pa rdzogs so/ /rtsar+ba Ti'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'o/ /dge slong rgya mtshos bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: lhan cig skyes pa'i glu
lhan cig skyes pa'i glu
sahajagiti
outline:node.outline:description: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug shAn+ta de bas mdzad par rdzogs so/ /bla ma d+hi ri shrI dz+nyA na'i zhabs dang / lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyu

outline:node.outline:title: rang bzhin gyi do ha mdzod kyi glu'i lta ba
tattvasvabhavadohakosagitikadristi
tattvasvabhavadohakosagitikadristi-nama
outline:node.outline:description: rang bzhin gyi do ha mdzod kyi glu'i lta ba zhes bya/ slob dpon lu yi pas mdzad pa rdzogs so

viklpapariharagiika
viklpapariharagiika-nama
outline:node.outline:description: rnam rtog spang ba'i glu zhes bya ba slob dpon li la pas mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: las kyi gtum mo'i do ha mdzod kyi glu
karmacandalikadohakosagiti
karmacandalikadohakosagiti-nama
outline:node.outline:description: las kyi gtum mo'i do ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon bi rU pas mdzad pa rdzogs so

bhavanadristicaryaphaladogagitika
bhavanadristicaryaphaladogagitika-nama
outline:node.outline:description: lta bsgom spyod pa 'bras bu do ha'i glu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon sa ra ha pas mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: do ha mdzod kyi de nyid kyi glu
dohadosatattvagitika
dohadosatattvagitika-nama
outline:node.outline:description: do ha mdzod kyi de nyid kyi glu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ka na ri nas brgyud pa/ tha ka nas mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: spyod pa'i do ha mdzod kyi glu
caryadohakosagitika
caryadohakosagitika-nama
outline:node.outline:description: spyod pa'i do ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon kaM ka ba la nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon kaM ka nas gsungs pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: lhan cig skyes dga'i do ha mdzod kyi glu'i lta ba
sahajanandadohakosagitikadristi
sahajanandadohakosagitikadristi-nama
outline:node.outline:description: lhan cig skyes dga'i do ha mdzod kyi glu'i lta ba zhes pa slob dpon b+ha d+hes mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:description: bde gshegs kyi lta ba'i glu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon d+ha ma pas mdzad pa rdzogs so

vayutattvadohagitika-nama
outline:node.outline:description: rlung gi de nyid kyi do ha'i glu zhes bya ba slob dpon nag po nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon ma hi pas mdzad pa rdzogs so

vasantatilakadohakosagitika-nama

vayutattvabhavana-
vayutattvabhavana-nama

svabhavasiddhyupadeca-nama

outline:node.outline:description: rje btsun yi ge brgya pa'i sems dpa' gsum gyi bsgom pa'i thabs/ slob dpon nA ro pas mdzad pa rdzogs so

ratnamala-nama

mahayanasthitiniccaya-nama

cittasampradayavyavasthana-nama
outline:node.outline:description: sems kyi gros 'debs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon a dzo kis mdzad pa rdzogs so

nadibindudvare-yogacarya-nama

aksaradvikopadeca-nama

sravaparicchedana

sarvadevatanispannakramamarga-nama

somasuryabandhanopaya-nama

acintyaparibhavana-nama
outline:node.outline:description: tshad med bzhi bsam gyis mi khyab pa sgom pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rA hu las mdzad pa rdzogs so

humkaracittabindubhavanakrama
humkaracittabindubhavanakrama-nama

prakritisiddhi
prakritisiddhi-nama

outline:node.outline:description: lhan skyes zung 'jug gi gdams pa/ slob dpon me d+hi nis mdzad pa rdzogs so

anuttarasarvacuddhikrama-nama

alikalimantrajnana-nama

kalibhavanamarga-nama

vayusthanarogapariksana-nama

sahajanantasvabhava-nama

caryadristyanutpannatattvahbavana-nama

ayuhpariraksa
ayuhpariraksa-nama
outline:node.outline:description: tshe sgrub pa'i gdams ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon ko ki las mdzad pa rdzogs so

visanirvahanabhavanakrama
visanirvahanabhavanakrama-nama

outline:node.outline:title: gnyis med kyi rtsa bsgom pa'i rim pa
suksmayoga
suksmayoga-nama
outline:node.outline:description: gnyis med kyi rtsa bsgom pa zhes bya ba slob dpon nag po nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon ni la khan d+has mdzad pa rdzogs sordzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: phra ba'i rnal 'byor
suksmayoga
suksmayoga-nama

bahyantaramritakalpa
bahyantaramritakalpa-nama
outline:node.outline:description: slob dpon b+h+ya ris gsungs pa'i phyin nang gi bdud rtsi'i bcud len gyi gdams pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta rat+na pha las rang 'gyur du mdzad nas/ bshad rgyud kyi gdams pa bar ma chad par gsungs s'o

outline:node.outline:title: do ha spyod pa'i glu'i lta ba
dohacaryagitikadristi
dohacaryagitikadristi-nama
