outline:node.outline:title: stong nyid kyi lta ba
shunyatadristi
shunyatadristi-nama
outline:node.outline:description: stong pa nyid kyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon sha ba ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: bde sdug gnyis bral gyi lta ba
sukha-dukhadvayaparityagadristi
sukha-dukhadvayaparityagadristi-nama
outline:node.outline:description: bde sdug gnyis bral gyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon shAn+ti pas mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: 'brel med kyi lta ba
asambandhadristi
asambandhadristi-nama
outline:node.outline:description: slob dpon kaM pa la'i 'brel med kyi lta ba 'di/ rnal 'byor rtogs tshad kyi lta ba rdzogs so/ /bla ma rat+na pha las rang 'gyur du bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: zhen med kyi lta ba
asambandhasargadristi
asambandhasargadristi-nama
outline:node.outline:description: slob dpon kaM pa las mdzad pa/ zhen med kyi lta ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: stong nyid snying rje'i lta ba
shunyatakarunadristi
shunyatakarunadristi-nama
outline:node.outline:description: stong nyid snying rje'i lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon AR+Ya de ba nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon tsa ta pas mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: sems nyid rin chen gyi lta ba
cittaratnadristi
cittaratnadristi-nama
outline:node.outline:description: sems nyid rin chen gyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ka na pa nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon d+he ta nas mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: de nyid brgyad kyi lta ba
tattvastakadristi
tattvastakadristi-nama
outline:node.outline:description: de nyid brgyad kyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon in d+ra b+hU tis mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: sems nyid kyi rtogs pa 'joms pa'i lta ba
cittakalpapariharadristi
cittakalpapariharadristi-nama
outline:node.outline:description: sems nyid kyi rtogs pa 'joms pa'i lta ba zhes bya ba/ kaM ka la dang / me kha la nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon lak+Sha mI yis gsungs pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: mya ngan gyi lta ba
shokavinodadristi
shokavinodadristi-nama
outline:node.outline:description: mya ngan gyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ma hi la nas brgyud pa/ d+ha'u ris mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: sems tsam gyi lta ba
cittamatradristi
cittamatradristi-nama
outline:node.outline:description: sems tsam gyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon sa ra ha nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon mai tri pas gsungs pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: snying rje spyod pa thod pa'i lta ba
karunacaryakapaladristi
karunacaryakapaladristi-nama
outline:node.outline:description: snying rje thod pa spyod pa'i lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon d+ha ri ka pa nas brgyud pa/ slob dpon sa ra b+ha khas mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: 'brel med kyi lta ba
asambandhadristi
asambandhadristi-nama
outline:node.outline:description: slob dpon nag po pas mdzad pa/ 'brel med kyi lta ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: de bzhin nyid kyi lta ba
tathatadristi
tathatadristi-nama
outline:node.outline:description: de bzhin nyid kyi lta ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon dA ri ka pas mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: phyag rgya chen po brda'i brgyud pa
mahamudrabhigiti
outline:node.outline:description: sangs rgyas gnyis pa ltar grags pa/ bla ma rgya gar nag gu'i zhal snga nas/ bod kyi ban+de zha ma lo tsA bas byin rlabs kyi gnas mchog ding rir bsgyur te/ bla ma byang chub sems dpa' kun dga' la gtad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag rdo rje gsang ba'i glu
mahamudropadecavajraguhyagiti
outline:node.outline:description: phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag rdo rje gsang ba'i mgur zhes bya ba/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal sa ra ha'i zhal nas gsungs pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la shI la dang / bod kyi ban+de lo tsA ba zha ma ston pa seng ge rgyal pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur
dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i mgur
crivajradakinigiti
crivajradakinigiti-nama
outline:node.outline:description: makha' 'gro ma brda'i mgur chung/ gsang mdzad 'phrul gyi rgya/ khyad par du brgyud pa/ zha ma lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i brda'i mgur
vajradakinigiti
vajradakinigiti-nama
outline:node.outline:description: mkha' 'gro ma'i brda bam po lnga pa zhes bya ba/ gsang mdzod na shog dril du gnas pa las/ dbyings kyi gtso mo rnams kyis bka' bgros nas/ rje dam pa rgya gar la gnang / slad kyis ding ri zla 'khor du/ zha ma lo tsA bas bsgyur nas/ bla ma byang chub sems dpa' kun dga' la gtad/ 'di khyad par gyi brgyud pa chen po brgyad las/ brda skor rnam pa bzhi rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: thugs kyi gsang ba glur blangs pa
cittaguhyadoha
cittaguhyadoha-nama
outline:node.outline:description: thig le dag pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/ grub thob pho mo brgyad bcu'i rtogs pa brjod pa/ mkha' 'gro mas yi ger btab ste/ gsang mdzod na gnas pa las/ dbyings kyi gtso mo rnams kyis bka' bgros nas/ rje dam pa rgya gar la gnang ba/ zha ma lo tsA bas legs par bsgyur ba'o/

outline:node.outline:title: grub thob lnga bcu'i rtogs pa brjod pa thig le 'od kyi phreng ba
pancacatsiddhavadanatilakaprabhavali
pancacatsiddhavadanatilakaprabhavali-nama
outline:node.outline:description: grub thob lnga bcu'i rtogs pa brjod pa thig le 'od kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba/ mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang mdzod nas phyung ste/ rje dam pa rgya gar rin po che la gnang ba/ zha ma lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: phyag rgya chen po rin po che brda'i man ngag
mahamudaratnabhigityupadeca
mahamudaratnabhigityupadeca-nama
outline:node.outline:description: le phran lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa/ phyag rgya chen po rin po che brda'i man ngag /rje dam pa la mkha' 'gro mas gtad de zha ma lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gsang ba'i glu
dakinivajraguhyagiti
dakinivajraguhyagiti-nama
outline:node.outline:description: mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang mdzod na gnas pa las/ dbyings kyi gtso mo rnams kyis bka' bgros nas/ ka ma la shI la la gtad/ zha ma lo tsA ba ston pa seng ge rgyal pos bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: gnad kyi gdams pa bstan pa
outline:node.outline:description: rngon pa chen pos ka ma la shI la la gnad kyi gdams pa bstan pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: sems kyi gsang ba zab don brda'i glur blangs pa
cittaguyagambhirarthagiti
cittaguyagambhirarthagiti-nama
outline:node.outline:description: zab mo brda'i glu gsang ba'i bdud rtsi zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /sha ba ri dbang phyug gis dam pa la gsungs pa/ dam pa'i zhal snga nas zha ma lo tsA bas gtan la phab ste/ dpal ding ri mkhan pa'i khrod du bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: rdo rje'i mgur bzhengs pa nyams kyi man ngag thig le gser gyi phreng ba
rdo rje'i mgur bzhengs pa nyams kyi man ngag thig le gser gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba
[vajragitibhavanopadecatilakakanakamala-nama]
outline:node.outline:description: dpal u rgyan du tshogs 'khor byas pa'i dus su rdo rje'i mgur bzhengs pa/ nyams kyi man ngag /thig le gser gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma sum cu rtsa lnga'i rtogs par brjod pa
outline:node.outline:description: ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma sum cu rtsa lnga'i rtogs par brjod pa/ mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang mdzod na gnas pa las/ dbyings kyi gtso mo rnams kyis bka' bgros nas/ rje dam pa rgya gar la gnang ba zha ma lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: mkha' 'gro ma'i 'byam glu
dakinitanugiti
dakinitanugiti-nama
outline:node.outline:description: mkha' 'gro ma'i 'byam glu ring mo zhes bya ba rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: phyag rgya chen po rin po che dbang gi 'khor lo
mahamudraratnabhisekacakra
outline:node.outline:description: bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma'i brda rin po che dbang gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba/ dur khrod rgyu skar dpal gyi rol par gsungs pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid snang ba grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i mgur
rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid snang ba zhes bya ba grub pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i mgur
sarvayogatattvaloka-nama-sakalassiddhavajragiti
outline:node.outline:description: rgyal sras mi'i seng+ge rje dam pa rgya gar rin po che'i zhal snga nas/ rang 'gyur du mdzad pa/ phyag rgya chen po dum bu khrigs/ /tshigs tu nyung la don du 'gril/ /nyams myong skyes pa rdo rje'i mgur/ /ma rig mun sel sgron me 'di/ /skal ldan mig gi dbang po yis/ /lta bas mi ngoms blos mi 'khyud/ /sgro 'dogs glags pa tsam gyis chod/ /e ma ngo re mtshar rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: phyag rgya chen po gser phreng
mahamudrakanakalama
mahamudrakanakalama-nama
outline:node.outline:description: phyag rgya chen po do rje'i glu/ rin po che gser phreng zhes bya ba/ grub pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang/ paN+Di ta mang pos gsungs pa rnams/ rje btsun mnga' bdag mai tri pas/ gzhung gcig tu bsdebs pa'i gdams pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de nyid dang/ lo tsA ba mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: she rab kyi 'phrin yig
prajnalekha
prajnalekha-nama
outline:node.outline:description: she rab kyi 'phrin yig slob dpon chen po pad+ma rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po shAn+ta b+ha dra dang / bod kyi zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: rnal 'byor pa'i rtogs pa'i gegs sel ba
yogikalpavighnanibarhana-nama
outline:node.outline:description: rnal 'byor pa'i rtogs pa'i gegs sel ba zhes bya ba/ dngos grub brnyes pa'i slob dpon mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas gsang pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: dug lnga sbas pa'i mchog tu gsang pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa
atiguhyacintya-nama-pancavisaguptamarga
outline:node.outline:description: dug lnga sbas pa'i mchog tu gsang pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon 'phags pa lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid bden pa
yogalaksanasatya
outline:node.outline:description: rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid bden pa/ mkhas pa chen po dpal byang chub bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: shes rab brtsam pa dus kyi gtam
prajnarambhavadhiparikatha
prajnarambhavadhiparikatha-nama
outline:node.outline:description: shes rab brtsam pa dus kyi gtam zhes bya ba/ b+hang+ga la'i mkhas pa dpal nges par sbyangs pa dpal ldan gnyis su med pa'i rdo rjes bram ze b+ha lo la gdams pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs kyi le'u
samadhisambharaparivarta
outline:node.outline:description: ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs kyi le'u/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya lbo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yan lag bdun pa'i cho ga
lokatitasaptangavidhi
outline:node.outline:description: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yan lag bdun pa'i cho ga slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis/ dpal bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che'i gru bo
sugatacasanartnavohittha
sugatacasanartnavohittha-nama
outline:node.outline:description: bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che'i gru bo zhes bya ba/ grub pa brnyes pa'i paN+Di ta chen po a dzi ta mi tra gup+tasa mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: dpal 'ching ba rnam grol gyi bstan bcos
cribandhavimuktacastra
outline:node.outline:description: dpal 'ching ba rnam grol gyi bstan bcos/ rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po grub pa brnyes pa'i dpal niska lang+kasa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI dza ga ta mi trA nan+da'i zhal snga nas/ kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po bud d+hA shrI b+ha dras gtan la phab nas/ bod kyi lo chung gnubs tshul khrims shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: lta spyod rnam dag gi man ngag
vicuddhadarcanacaryopadeca
vicuddhadarcanacaryopadeca-nama
outline:node.outline:description: lta spyod rnam dag gi man ngag ces bya ba kha che'i rigs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dpal chos kyi rje shAkya shrI b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /mkhas pa chen po de nyid kyi spyan sngar lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis khro phu bzang lung du bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: sems rin po che sbyang ba'i lam 'bras
cittaratnavicodhanamargaphala
outline:node.outline:description: kha che'i rigs las bal yul du sku 'khrungs pa'i paN+Di ta chen po dpal lnga rig pa'i mchogs bud d+ha shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa/ sems rin po che sbyang ba'i lam 'bras zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /mkhas pa chen po de nyid kyi spyan snga lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bal yul yam 'gal gyi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: 'ching ba rnam grol gyi man ngag
bandhavimuktopadeca
bandhavimuktopadeca-nama
outline:node.outline:description: 'ching ba rnam grol gyi man ngag ces bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug shrI dza ga ta mi tra A nan+da'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa rdzogs so/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug de nyid kyi spyan sngar lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bal yul gu lang gser khang du bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: grub pa dam pa'i lam nges pa
siddhisanmarganirnaya
siddhisanmarganirnaya
rnal 'byor pa rang gi sems mdud pa 'grol ba'i man ngag
yogisvacittagranthamocakopadeca
outline:node.outline:description: rang gi sems kyi mdud pa 'grol ba'i gdams pa rdzogs so/ /bla ma mi tra A nan+da zhes bya ba sbas pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid bod yul kha ba can gyi mthil bkra shis kyi tshong 'dus chen po 'gur mo rin po che'i gling du byon pa'i tshe mdo sngags kyi bdag po chen po/ rgya 'bre/ lam/ lo/dro/gshen drug gis zhus pa'i don du gsungs pa/ phyag rgya chen po chig chod kyi do ha gnubs lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: rnal 'byor bdun gyi lam rnam par nges pa
dpal rnal 'byor bdun gyi lam rnam par nges pa
crisaptayogamargaviniccaya
outline:node.outline:description: dpal rnal 'byor rnam pa bdun gyi lam rnam par nges pa/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po shrI dza ga ta mi tra a nan+da'i thugs kyi 'khor lo dam pa/ bkra shis kyi tshong dus chen po dpal mgur mo rin po che'i gling du/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po/ rgya/'bre/lam/lo/dro/ gshen/ drug gi don du mdzad pa'i bstan bcos/ de kho na nyid rnal du mtshon pa'i man ngag rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang bskur ba
samadhyabhiseka
outline:node.outline:description: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang bskur rdzogs so/ /gnubs lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: pha rol dbang du bya ba
paravacikarana
outline:node.outline:description: pha rol dbang du bya ba gnubs lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: rin po che 'khor lo'i dbang gi man ngag gi rim pa
ratnacakrabhisekopadecakrama
outline:node.outline:description: rin chen 'khor lo'i dbang gi man ngag gi rim pa/ slob dpon in+d+ra b+hu ti'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: dbang gi rim pa bstan pa
nirdesanabhisekarama
nirdesanabhisekarama-nama
outline:node.outline:description: dbang gi rim pa bstan pa rje btsun klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong ye shes bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa

outline:node.outline:title: dbang gi rim pa mdor bsdus pa
samksiptabhisekakrama
outline:node.outline:description: dbang gi don bsdus pa slob dpon dpal shes rab gsang ba'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: bzhi pa'i don rnam par nges pa'i man ngag
outline:node.outline:description: bzhi pa rnam par nges pa'i man ngag ces bya ba'i rab tu byed pa kha che'i slob dpon chen po rig byed kyi mtha' 'dzin pa dpal rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA b+ha dra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims bkra shis kyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: dbang bskur ba'i nges par bstan pa
abhisekanirukti
outline:node.outline:description: dbang bskur ba'i nges par bstan pa/ slob dpon mkhas pa chen po rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po shAn+ti b+ha dra dang / lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa

outline:node.outline:title: dbang gi don nges par brjod pa
sekarthanirukti
sekarthanirukti-nama
outline:node.outline:description: dbang gi don nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rgyal ba bzang po dpal sbas pa zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /ru lag rgyang gi gtsug lag khang du rgya gar gyi mkhan po a ba d+hU tI pa'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya brtson 'grus kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: rdo rje theg pa rtsa ba'i ltung ba bsdus pa
vajrayanamulapattisamgraha
outline:node.outline:description: rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba bsdus pa slob dpon chen po rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: ltung ba sbom po
sthulapatti
outline:node.outline:description: ltung ba sbom po bsdus pa/ slob dpon rta dbyangs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: ltung ba bco lnga pa
pancadacapatti
outline:node.outline:description: ltung ba bco lnga pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: yan lag gi nyes pa bdun pa
angaparadhasaptaka
outline:node.outline:description: yan lag gi nyes pa bdun pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: rdo rje theg pa'i sbom po'i ltung ba
vajrayanasthulapatti
outline:node.outline:description: rdo rje theg pa'i sbom po'i ltung ba/ slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad+ma ka ra barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /slad kyis rgya gar gyi mkhan po bla ma rje btsun paN+Di ta chen po ma Ni ka shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas dang / chag lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong chos rje dpal gyis zhus te dag par bgyis so

outline:node.outline:title: yan lag dam tshig
outline:node.outline:description: yan lag gi dam tshig ces bya ba rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: rdo rje theg pa'i ltung ba'i snye ma
vajrayanapattimanjari
vajrayanapattimanjari-nama
outline:node.outline:description: rdo rje theg pa'i ltung ba'i snye ma zhes bya ba mkhas pa chen po a b+h+yA ka ra gup+tasa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /ma ga d+hA'i mkhas pa chen po de nyid dang / mang du thos pa'i dge slong bsod snyoms pa sangs rgyas grags pas/ nA len d+rar bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ltung bcu bzhi pa'i 'grel pa
vajrayanacaturdasamulaattivrtti
outline:node.outline:description: slob dpon chen po dpal lak+Sh+mI ka ra'i zhal nas mdzad pa/ rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu bzhi pa'i 'grel pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa
vajrayanamulapattika
outline:node.outline:description: slob dpon chen po snying po zhabs kyis mdzad pa/ slob dpon b+ha bi pa'i gdams ngag mngon par bkod pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: rtsa ltung rgya cher 'grel pa
rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa
mulapattitika
outline:node.outline:description: gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi bslab pa gsal bar byed pa'i man ngag ces bya ba/ slob dpon rgyal ba'i lhas mdzad pa'i tsa ba'i ltung ba'i 'grel pa/ mkhas pa chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa rdzogs so/ paN+Di ta de nyid dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i rgya cher bshad pa
vajrayanakulapattitika
outline:node.outline:description: rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa lam gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba de la phan par byed pa'i yan lag dang bcas pa/ slob dpon 'jam dpal grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /myang ro stag tshal du dI paM ka ra bod du byon tsam na bsgyur/ pu ri sha'i grong khyer du A tsaR+Ya u pa d+ha shrI badz+ra shI la dang / lo tsA ba dge slong brtson 'grus seng ges legs par mnos te gus par bsgyur ba'o/ /bal po'i khyim du du ma'i lo/ /rin chen grags pa bdag gis 'ongs/ /'grel dpe rnying pa la yang btugs/ /shin tu yang ni dag par bgyis

outline:node.outline:title: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs
vajrasattvasadhana
vajrasattvasadhana-nama
outline:node.outline:description: lam thams cad kyi dag byed kyi thabs dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brgya pa'i sgrub thabs/ bla ma mngon shes can rdo rje gdan pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /yul dbus kyi dpe ji lta ba bzhin lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos gtsug lags khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du gus pas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: gsang ba thams cad kyi spyi'i cho ga'i snying po rgyan
dpal gsang ba thams cad kyi spyi'i cho ga'i snying po'i rgyan
crisarvaguhyavidhigarbhalamkara
crisarvaguhyavidhigarbhalamkara-nama
outline:node.outline:description: gsang ba thams cad kyi spyi'i cho ga'i snying po rgyan zhes bya ba/ slob dpon 'jam dpal grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bal po'i mkhan po ka na ka shrI dang / lo tsA ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o/ /slad kyis rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta ha s+ya badz+ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong nyi ma rdo rjes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga
ganacakravidhi
ganacakravidhi-nama
outline:node.outline:description: ma hA paN+Di ta a b+h+ya ka ra gup+tasa mdzad pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga rdzogs so/ /ma hA paN+Di ta shrI rat+na rak+Shi ta'i zhal snga nas so

outline:node.outline:title: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga
ganacakravidhi
outline:node.outline:description: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa'i cho ga slob dpon nag po pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po kriSh+Na pa de nyid dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gos lhas btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga
ganacakravidhi
outline:node.outline:description: paN+Di ta bzang po sbyin pas tshogs kyi 'khor lo mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya shrI b+ha drA dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong kun dga' rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: tshog kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga yid bzhin nor bu
ganacakravidhicintamani
ganacakravidhicintamani-nama
outline:node.outline:description: tshog kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba/ paN+Di ta rat+na rak+Shi tas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta rat+na rak+Shi ta pa'i zhal snga nas/ bod kyi lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa grub pa dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga rim par phye ba
ganacakravidhipradaca
ganacakravidhipradaca-nama
outline:node.outline:description: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga rim par phye ba zhes bya ba/ A tsaR+Ya he ru ka badz+ras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta rat+na rak+Shi ta'i zhal snga nas lo tsA ba grub pa dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: sku gsung thugs rab tu gnas pa
sku dang gsung dang thugs rab tu gnas pa
kayavakcittasupratistha
kayavakcittasupratistha-nama
outline:node.outline:description: sku dang gsung dang thugs rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba/ dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra dang / lo tsA ba rgya brtson seng ges bi kra ma shI lar bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: gdugs la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa dang rnying pa 'byin pa'i cho ga
chattradipratisthajirnodbhavavidhi
outline:node.outline:description: gdugs la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa dang rnying pa 'byin pa'i cho ga 'di'i rgya dpe gnyal gyi phyogs nas rnyed do/ /bstan pa rin po che la phul du byung ba'i gces spras su mdzad pa mtshungs med chos kyi rje rin po che zhwa dmar cod pan 'dzin pa bzhi pa'i zhal snga nas bsgyur cig ces bka' bstsal pa bzhin zha lu lo tsA ba dge slong chos skyong bzang pos dpal sne'u gdong rtser bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: sa dang shing dang rdo'i cho ga
outline:node.outline:description: gtsug lag khang la sogs bzhengs pa la nye bar mkho ba'i sa brtag pa dang shing dang rdo ba'i cho ga 'di sngags kyi gzhung lugs che ba zhig gis dum bu mngon no/ /'di'i rgya dpe gnyal gyi phyogs nas rnyed de lha dang bcas pa'i skye dgu mtha' dag gi gtsug gi nor bus zhabs rten gyi pad+ma la phyag byas pa'i 'dren pa dam pa chos kyi rje rin po che zhwa dmar cod pan 'dzin pa bzhi pa'i zhal snga nas bsgyur cig ces gsung ba bzhin du zha lu lo tsA bas dpal sne'u gdong rtser bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: dbyig gi phreng ba zhes bya ba cho ga'i bya ba bcu pa
hiranyamala-nama-dasakryavidhi

outline:node.outline:description: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i 'grel ba mdzes pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po rdo rje go chas mdzod pa rdzogs so/ /'grel ba 'di yi tshad gyur pa/ tshig su bcad pa drug stong dang / bcu bzhi dag ni yod pa ste/ yi ge mkhan la phan phyir ro/ dpal ldan ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgya cher 'grel ba 'di dpyad zlar ba'i yar gyi ngo'i gza' phur bu skar ma rgyal gyi nyin par mchog gis rje btsun rgyal po chen po mchog gi dbang phyug dpal lha 'od zer go cha yis/ mdzad pa'i dpal rgyal po'i lha khang du shAkya'i dge slong rin chen 'byung gnas bzang po rang gis lag pas bris te/ lo lnga brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga lon no

outline:node.outline:description: kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang dam tshig la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi rnam par bshad pa/ slob dpon dngos grub thob pa lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pas mdzad pa dzogs so/ /gsang sngags rig 'dzin sde snod la/ mkha' ltar shes rab dang ba ni/ nyi ma lta bur ma mongs pa'i/ mkhas pa dza la de ba la/ langs ban+de tshul brtsegs kyis/ gus bcas mang du gsol btab nas/ spu rgyal bod las khyad par du/ nad med sa gsang mdo khams su/ yid bzhin nor 'dra'i gzungs mchog gi /'grel pa dpag bsam shing 'dra 'di/ bsgyur ba'i dge bas dad ldan rnams/ gzungs 'di rgya cher spyod par shog /paN+Di ta dza yaM de ba dang / lo tsA ba langs ban+de tshul khrims brtsegs kyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa
lokesvarastotra-nama
outline:node.outline:description: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la/tsaR+Ya Di pa zhabs kyis bstod pa rdzogs so/ /sgra mkhan chen po rgyal ba snyan gyi zhal snga nas/ lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga'i bstod pa
arya-amoghapacapancadevastotra
outline:node.outline:description: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa lha lnga'i bstod pa/ paN+Di ta chen po e ra pa tis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang / lo tsA ba ba ri rin chen grags pas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la tsar+pa Tisa bstod pa
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la tsar+pa Tisa bstod pa
arya-avalokitecvarasya carbpatiracitastotra
outline:node.outline:description: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi bstod pa grub thob chen po tsarba pa Tisa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po nags kyi rin chen gyi zhal snga nas dang / lo tsA ba 'gos gzhon nu dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: 'jig rten mgon po mkha' la spyod pa'i sgrub thabs
dpal 'jig rten mgon po mkha' la spyod pa'i sgrub thabs
khasarpanalokanathasadhana
sri-khasarpanalokanathasadhana-nama
'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa brgya pa
lodesvaracatakastotra
outline:node.outline:description: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa brgya pa/ snyan ngag mkhan chen po shrI badz+ra de ba zhes bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /yon tan phul du byung ba dpag tu med pa dang ldan pas spras pa bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po dang / mi'i dbang po dpon chen shAkya bzang po'i bka' lung gis/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po snyan ngag mkhan chen po ma hA paN+Di ta lak+Sh+mi ka ra dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shong ston gyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: 'jig rten dbang phyug la bstod pa
lokecvarastotra
outline:node.outline:description: 'jig rten dbang phyug la bstod pa/ dge slong ma dpal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: nor bu gling gi thugs rje chen po lha lnga la bstod pa
manidvipamahakarunikapancadevastotra
outline:node.outline:description: nor bu gling gi thugs rje chen po lha lnga la bstod pa/ slob dpon rta dbyangs kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa
arya-avalokitecvarastotra
outline:node.outline:description: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa la bstod pa/ slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: thugs rje chen po la smre sngags kyis bstod pa
mahakarunikakuvakyastotra-nama
outline:node.outline:description: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la/ slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis bstod pa smre sngags su gsol pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: spyan ras gzigs la smre sngags kyi sgo nas bstod pa byin rlabs can
thugs rje chen po la smre sngags kyis bstod pa byin rlabs can
mahakarunikakuvakyastotrasdhisthan-nama
outline:node.outline:description: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la smre sngags kyi sgo nas bstod pa byin rlabs can 'di nyid/ lnga brgya pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu lta bur gyur pa/ mthong lam rgyud la skyis pa'i gang zag /slob dpon chen po zla ba grags pa'i zhal mnga' nas mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: snying rje la bstod pa
snying rje la bstod pa
karunastotra
outline:node.outline:description: snying rje la bstod pa/ dge bsnyen kun sbyin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa
dpal 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa
avalokitesvarasya stuti
sri-aryavalokitesvarasya stuti-nama
outline:node.outline:description: bcom ldan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang bstod phyag 'tshal/ dge slong ma zla mdzes kyis bstod pa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /'di ni rgya gar shar phyogs kyi btsun pa tsan+d+ra shrI'i dag las 'byung ba dang rgya dpe bstun nas dge slong bsod nams rnam rgyal gyis bsgyur ba'o/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang po mgon po mchog la bstod pa' yi/ bsod nams gang zhing zla ba dung ltar dkar ba des/ rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyi thu bo de ltar bur/ sdug bsngal 'gro ma mi 'jigs rtsos ba nyid gyur cig /ral pa 'chang zhing shin tu zhi ba yangs pa'i spyan/ rtag par rab tu dang ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhal/ lha dang lha min rnams kyis zhabs kyi 'dam skyes la/ phyag byas nor bu pad+ma la byung mgon por 'dud/ 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug la/ glu'i rgyal po nor rgyal kyis bstod pa/ dpal nags kyi rin chen gyi zhal sngar bsod nams rnam par rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: 'jig rten dbang phyug la klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bus bstod pa
'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug la klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bus bstod pa
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong pa'i sgrub thabs
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong pa'i sgrub thabs
arya sahasrabhujavalokitecvara sadhana
outline:node.outline:description: slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub bdag nyid chen po mi 'phrogs pa'i mkhyen rab dang thugs rje ldan pa sa drug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin yang / sa dang po'i byang chub sems dpar byin gyis brlabs pa/ dper na da'i nye gnas kun dga' bo sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' yin yang so so'i skye bor byin brlabs pa lta bu'o/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la/ 'jig rten khams bde ba cen du gshegs te/ sa brgyad pa la gnas nas lus gnyis su byas te/ gcig ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa la mchod par byed/ gcig ni dga' ldan du byams pa la mdo 'di nyid kyi don 'dri'o zhes gsungs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams dang ba'i 'od ces bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung gnas 'od ces bya bar lung bstan par mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi yi ge drug pa'i sgrub thabs
aryalokecvarasadaksarasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: thugs rje chen po'i sgrub thabs yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi slob dpon pad+ma'i zhal snga nas/ bod kyi lo tsA ba btsun pa rgyal ba mchog dbyangs kyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: spyan ras gzigs zhal bcu gcig pa'i sgrub thabs
rje btsun 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bcu gcig pa'i sgrub thabs
battaarakaryaikadasamukhavalokitesvarasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs zhal bcu gcig pa'i sgrub thabs/ dge slong ma dpal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsA ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

arya-valokitesvarastotra
outline:node.outline:description: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa/ dge slong ma dpal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so

aryavalokitecvarastottaracatakasadhana
thugs rje chen po khar+sa pA Na'i sgrub thabs tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa
outline:node.outline:description: thugs rje chen po kha sarba N-i'i sgrub thabs tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa rdzogs so/ /slob dpon a dzi ta mi tra gup+tasa mdzad/ rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta shrI dza ta mi tra nan+ta zhal snga nas dang/ kha che'i paN+Di ta bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA nas gtan la phab nas/ bod kyi lo tsA ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: 'phags pa phyag stong spyan stong gi sgrub thabs
sahasra-bhujanetra-sadhana
outline:node.outline:description: slob dpon chen po dngos grub bsnyes pa/ ta thA ga ta vadz+ra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyag stong spyan stong gi sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas shar phyogs b+haM ga la'i nyi ma 'byung gnas zla ba zhes bya ba/ mkhas pa chen po yi zhal snga nas/ bod kyi lo tsA ba dge tshul khyung grags kyis/ 'dul ba'i bstan pa snying po gnas pa'i sa/ dpal ldan rgyan gong gtsug lag khang de ru/ bder gshegs bstan la phan phyir bsgyur lags kyi/ rnal 'byor spyod rnams nges par brtson par mdzod

outline:node.outline:title: 'khor los sgyur ba'i sgrub thabs

outline:node.outline:description: 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'khor los sgyur pa'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon dze ta rim mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta pur+Na kirtisa dang / sna nam rdo rje bla mas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs
lokesvara-sadhana
outline:node.outline:description: 'jig rten dbang phyug zhal gcig pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/ chags lo tsA ba chos rje dpal gyis nyung du bsdus te bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: yi ge drug pa'i rgyud kyi rim pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs
sadaksaratantrakramena mandalacakropadecasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: yi ge drug pa'i rgyud kyi rim pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po ma hA dza na dang / lo tsA ba gzhon nu 'od kyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: spyan ras gzigs kha sar+pa Ni sgrub thabs
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kha sar+pa Ni sgrub thabs

outline:node.outline:description: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kha sar+pa Ni sgrub thabs/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: 'phags pa yi ge drug pa'i sgrub thabs
arya-sadaksara-sadhana
outline:node.outline:description: 'phags pa yi ge drug pa'i thabs rdzogs sa/ slob dpon chen po pU dza badz+rasa mdzad pa'o/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya blo gros kyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs
arya-valokiteshvara-sadhana

outline:node.outline:title: rnal 'byor snying po
yogasara

outline:node.outline:title: dpal kha sar+pa Na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs
sri-khasarpanalokeshvara-sadhana
outline:node.outline:description: thugs rje chen po kha sar+pa Na'i sgrub thabs/ grub pa'i brnyes pa'i skyes bu chen po shrI shAn+ta ka ras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bod kyi lo tsA ba gnubs byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug lha lnga'i sgrub thabs

outline:node.outline:description: thugs rje chen po lha lnga'i sgrub thabs/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI mi tra a nan ta'i gdams pa rdzogs so/ /gnubs lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs
simhanada-sadhana

outline:node.outline:title: 'jig rten dbang phyug seng+ge sgra zhes bya ba'i bstod pa
lokesvara-simhanada-nama-stotra
outline:node.outline:description: bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug seng+ge sgra'i bstod pa/ rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po ti la kas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de nyid dang lo tsA ba mal gyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: seng ge sgra'i bsrung ba'i 'khor lo
sinhanadaraksacakra
outline:node.outline:description: rje btsun seng ge sgra'i bsrung ba'i 'khor bla ma'i zhal nas 'ongs pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: don yod zhags pa'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa
samksiptamoghamoghapacasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: don yod zhags pa'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa/ kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI b+ha dras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong rab mchog dpal bzang pos/ drang srong srin po rir bsgyur ro

outline:node.outline:title: don yod zhags pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga
amoghapashabalividhi
outline:node.outline:description: don yod zhags pa'i gtor ma'i cho ga kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI b+ha dras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /lo tsA ba dge slong rab mchog dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: gso sbyong blang ba
posadhakaraniya
outline:node.outline:description: kha che'i paN+Di ta shAkya shrI b+ha dras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /lo tsA ba dge slong rab mchog dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i gso sbyong gi cho ga'i man ngag
arya-amoghapashaposadhavidhyamnaya
outline:node.outline:description: 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i gso sbyong gi cho ga'i man ngag /kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po shAkya shrI b+ha dras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong rab mchog dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs
sri-vajrapanisadhana
outline:node.outline:description: dpal phyag na rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po de nyid dang / lo tsA ba 'jam dpal go chas bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: gos sngon po can gyi dngos grub nye ba
nilambaropasiddhi
outline:node.outline:description: slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i dngos grub nye bar byed pa'i mchod rten gyi man ngag rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ges bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: gnod pa sel ba'i bdud rtsi
[prayaccittamrita]
outline:node.outline:description: gnod pa sel ba'i bdud rtsi/ slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa/ rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta jo bo rje dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba rgya brtson seng ges bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: rdo rje byab pa'i las tshogs
[vajra-pavitra-karma-sambhara]
outline:node.outline:description: rdo rje bya ba'i las tshogs/ rje btsun klu sgrub kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta jo bo rje dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba rgya brtson seng ges bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: yan lag bdun pa'i sgrub thabs
[saptangasadhana]
outline:node.outline:description: slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta de nyid dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba rgya brtson seng ges bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs
gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs
mahayaksa-senapativajrapani-sadhana
mahayaksasenapativajrapani-nama-sadhana
outline:node.outline:description: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gzungs kyi sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon chen po su pA gi shA ra kIrtisa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta jo bo rje dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba rgya brtson seng ges bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: phyag na rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs
vajrapanisadhanopayika-nama
outline:node.outline:description: slob dpon gu ru su pA gi shwa ra kIrtisa mdzad pa/ rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta jo bo rje dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba rgya brtson seng ges bsgyur

outline:node.outline:title: phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs
phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba
nilambaradharavajrapanisadhana
nilambaradharavajrapanisadhana-nama
outline:node.outline:description: gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i gta'i gtor ma'i gdams ngag slob dpon su pA gI shwa ra kIrtisa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA dang / lo tsA ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ges bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: 'khor lo'i man ngag
'khor lo'i man ngag ces bya ba
cakropadesa
outline:node.outline:description: rig sngags drag po'i gzungs sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor zhes bya ba/ slob dpon su pA gI shwa ra kIrtisa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya bod gnyis la grags par gyur pa yis/ mdo sngags don la mkhas pa'i di paM ka ra la/ sgra sgyur bod na mkhas pa'i rgyal po brtson seng ges bka' bas nyams su blangs nas rin chen gser gyis zhus

outline:node.outline:title: phyag rdor gzungs kyi gtor ma'i cho ga

srivajrapaninilambaradharakalpabalividhi
outline:node.outline:description: phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi gzungs kyi gtor ma'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ slob dpon su pA gi shwa ra kIrtisa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA dang / lo tsA ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ges bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs mdor bsdus pa
vajrapani-sadhanopayika
vajrapanisadhanopayika-nama

outline:node.outline:description: klu 'bros pa'i sngags/ slob dpon su pA gI shwa ra kIrtisa mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs

outline:node.outline:title: phyag na rdo rje sgrub pa'i thabs
vajrapanisadhana

[pratitysamutpadadravyaraksa]
outline:node.outline:description: rten 'brel gyi bsrung ba/ jo bo rje dang / rgya brtson 'grus seng ges bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs
nilambaradharavajrapanisadhana

homakalikastotra

outline:node.outline:description: 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang cas pa/ bram ze rig sngags 'chang grub pa mkhas pa chen po ku mA ra se nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+ha gup+ta dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dbang many+dzu shrI varmasa bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ phyis paN+Di ta dz+nyA na teng ha du dang / lo tsa ba da 'og bsod nams mos pa shes rab kyis gsan nas zhus pa'o

vaganashritadhyana-nama-yogisamsarapratyayonmulana
outline:node.outline:description: sgra la mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya ba rnal 'byor pa'i dkyil 'khor rkyen drungs nas 'don pa/ slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: sgra mthar gyis rnal 'byor pa'i lus sems kyi 'brel ba gcad pa
vaganupurvena yogikayacittasambandhacchedana
outline:node.outline:description: sgra mthar gyis rnal 'byor pa'i lus sems kyi 'brel ba gcad pa/ slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa phyogs gcig tu sdebs pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: them yig gsang ba
guhyapattrika
outline:node.outline:description: them yig gsang ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /d+harma kIrti b+ha dras yang zhus byas so

outline:node.outline:title: khro bo'i rgyal po gnam lcags 'bar ba'i sgrub thabs
khro bo'i rgyal po rde rje gnam lcags 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ klu 'dul ba'i ngan thabs
krodharajojjvalavajrashani-nama-sadhana-nagadamanabhishapa
outline:node.outline:description: khro bo'i rgyal po rde rje gnam lcags 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ klu 'dul ba'i ngan thabs/ bal po'i man ngag rgya gar gyi bla ma mai tris mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: khro bo gnam lcags 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje gnam lcags 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
krodharajagujvarajavajramandala vidhi
krodharajagujvarajavajramandala vidhi-nama
outline:node.outline:description: khro bo'i rgyal po rdo rje gnam lcags 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /rgya gar gyi slob dpon chen po lho phyogs dpal gyi ri la bzhugs pa'i bla ma mai tri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta bal po de ba pur+Na ma ti dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba 'gar chos kyi bzang po'i bal po'i yul du bsgyur cing zhus te gten la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: gshin rje gshed po sgrub pa'i thabs
yamarisadhana
outline:node.outline:description: 'phas pa gshin rje gshed nag po'i rgyud la gsungs pa'i phyogs gcig pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so/ /slob dpon jo bo rje dang bod kyi lo tsA ba nag tsho tshul rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs
hayagrivasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: dpal rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon klu sgrub kyi mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs
rtog pa bdun brgya pa'i rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs
hayagrivasadhana
hayagrivasadhana-nama
outline:node.outline:description: rtog pa bdun brgya pa nas gsungs pa'i rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /rgya gar bA ra NA si'i paN+Di ta pu ru Shot+ta ma'i zhal snga nas mnyan te/ lo tsA ba shAkyi'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos nyang ro 'khros kyi gtsug lga khang du bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs
hayagrivasadhana
hayagrivasadhana-nama
outline:node.outline:description: rtog pa bdun brgya pa'i rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi yul bA ra NA si'i paN+Di ta pu ru Shot+ta ma'i zhal snga nas mnyan te/ lo tsA ba shAkyi'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bla ma dam pa'i bkas gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du legs par bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs
rgyud kyi snying po bla med rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs
hayagrivasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: rgyud thams cad kyi snying po bla med pa rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ paN+Di ta pra b+ha ka ras mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi yul bA ra NA si'i paN+Di ta pu ru Shot+ta ma'i zhal snga nas legs par mnyan te/ lo tsA ba shAkyi'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bla ma dam pa'i bkas gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: 'phags pa rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs
aryahayagrivasadhana-nama
outline:node.outline:description: 'phags pa rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ slob dpon dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: dpal rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs
shrihayagrivasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: dpal rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs/ slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: mi g.yo ba'i sgrub thabs
'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sgrub thabs
aryacalasadhana
arya-acalasadhana-nama
outline:node.outline:description: 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ bla ma gser gling pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /slob dpon dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas rang 'gyur du mdzad nas/ dge slong dbang phyug rgyal mtshan la gnang ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba la bstod pa
khro bo'i rgyal po 'phags mi g.yo ba la bstod pa
aryacalakrodharajastotra
aryacalakrodharajastotra
outline:node.outline:description: khro bo rgyal po mi g.yo ba la bstod pa/ paN+Di ta dI paM ka ra dz+nyA nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta de nyid dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: mi g.yo ba la bstod pa
khro bo rgyal po 'phags pa mi g.yo ba la bstod pa
aryacalakrodharajastotra
aryacalakrodharajastotra
outline:node.outline:description: 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po mi g.yo ba la bstod pa/ slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang / lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: khro chen gtum po'i sgrub thabs
candamaharosanasadhana
candamaharosanasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: khro chen gtum po'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon pra b+ha ka ra kIrtisa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /thugs rdzes chen po'i rgyud gsum pa/ mkhas rtogs 'dzom zhing yi dam mthong / spabosa pa brtsod pa snyan dang mkhas/ sbyin pa tshul khrims kyi rang 'gyur

outline:node.outline:title: khro chen gtum po chen po'i sgrub thabs
candamaharosanasadhana
candamaharosanasadhana-nama
outline:node.outline:description: khro chen gtum po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta puN+ye shrI dang / lo tsA ba glog skya gzhon nu 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o/ slob dpon dze tA ri dwag las rnam par rgyal bas mdzad pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: gtum po dkar po chen po'i sgrub thabs
gtum po dkar po khro po chen po'i sgrub thabs
shuklacandamaharosanasadhana
shuklacandamaharosanasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: gtum po khro bo chen po'i shes rab blo 'phel gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta dA na shrI las rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

aryacalasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po dA na shrI las rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i srung ba
mahapratisararaksa
outline:node.outline:description: so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i bsrung ba/ slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs kyis mdzad pa/ gdams ngag dus da lta byed pa'i tshul paN+Di ta su ma ti kIrti'i zhal snga nas gzhung du bsdebs pa rdzogs so/ /lag pa reg cing dza zhes brdzod pas gshegs su gsol/ lo tsA ba chen po d+harma kIrtisa bsgyur ba'o/ gzungs gzhan gyi cho ga pyed/ gra la lnga gang yin pa'i mtshan ma dbus su bris la/ gzhan rdul tshon dang gtor ma dang dbus kyi bum pa gzhan dang rten dang / cho ga'i rim pa thams cad gong ma dang 'gre'o/ de ltar byas pas gzungs ga'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur ro/ yang dang yang du bla ma la gtugs pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i rig pa'i cho ga

outline:node.outline:description: 'phags pa so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i rig pa'i cho ga rdzogs so/ /rgya gar yul ba ra NA sir paN+Di ta pu ru Shot+ta ma'i zhal snga nas legs par mnyan te/ lo tsA ba dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/ gtsug lag khang chen po thar pa gling du bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:description: bsrung ba lnga'i cho ga slob dpon rin chen 'byung gnas zhi bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po mu di ta shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsA ba ban+de bkra shis rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o/ /chag lo tsA bas bsgyur te bcos pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: so sor 'brang ma chen mo'i 'khor lo bri ba'i cho ga
mahapratisaracakralekhanavidhi
mahapratisaracakralekhanavidhi

pancaraksarcanavidhi
outline:node.outline:description: bsrung ba lnga'i mchod pa'i cho ga rdzogs so/ /rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po/ nags kyi rin chen gyi zhal snga nas dang / gzhon nu dpal gyis bsgyar ba'o/ 'di ni dze tA ri'i rjes su 'brang pa yin no zhes gsungs so

outline:node.outline:name: Other works on tantra
rgyud sde bzhi thun mong ba/

outline:node.outline:title: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdo rje phreng ba
vajravali-nama-mandalopayika
outline:node.outline:description: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya ba paN+Di ta chen po gnas brtan chen po a b+ha yA ka ra gup+tasa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta chen po de nyid dang / lo tsA ba khe rgad ban+de 'khor lo grags kyis bsgyur/ bstan bcos kun gyi spu ti gcig /phyogs kun mi 'jigs seng ge dang /khe rgad ban+de 'khor lo grags kyis bsgyur/ /dus phyis khams pa ban+de shes rab dpal gyis/ bi kra ma shrI la'i gtsug lag khang du mkhas pa chen po de nyid kyi spyan sngar legs par gtugs shing bcos nas gtan la phab pa'o/ /slad kyis bla ma rje btsun paN+Di ta chen po mkhas btsun grub chen brnyes pa rat+na rak+Shi ta'i zhabs dang /bla ma chos rje paN+Di ta gnas brtan chen po ra hu la shrI b+ha bra'i zhal snga nas dang / bla ma rje btsun chen po nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer gyi zhal snga nas dang / paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po ma Ni ka shrI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas/ chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis legs par zhus shing gtugs te gtan la phab pa'o/ /slad yang lo tsA ba dge slong dpal ldan blo gros brtan pa sgra dang don la legs par dpyad nas/ mi bcos su mi rung ba rnams bsgyur te/ cung zad dag par byas so

outline:node.outline:title: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi phreng ba
nishpannayogavali
outline:node.outline:description: rdo rje 'phag mos mngon sum du byin gyis brlabs pa'i paN+Di ta chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /'di'i gzhung tshad ni stong nyis brgya bzhus so/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i dpal bzang pos 'gyur rnying pa la brten nas smon 'gre'i gtsug lag khang du sgra rang sgyur mdzad pa'o/ /paN+Di ta de nyid kyis lan gnyis su zhus shing gtugs so/ slad kyi rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po mkhas btsun mchog gi grub pa rnyes pa/ bla ma rje btsun chen po rat+na rak+Shi ta'i zhabs dang / bla ma rje btsun paN+Di ta chen po re wan+d+ra'i zhal snga nas/ chag lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong dpal gyi mtha' can gyis zhus shing dag par bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: sbyin sreg gi cho ga 'od kyi snye ma
jyotirmañjari-nama-homopayika
outline:node.outline:description: sbyin sreg gi cho ga 'od kyi snye ma zhes bya ba/ rje btsun ma rdo rje rnal 'byor mas byi gyis rlabs pa'i paN+Di ta chen po a b+ha yA ka ra gup+ta'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i dpal bzang pos/ bod yul gyi dbus drang srong srin po rir rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o/ slad kyis paN+Di ta chen po rig pa'i gnas rnams thugs su chud pa'i mkhas pa dag dang /grub pa rnyed pa'i skyes bu chen po rnams kyi gsung gi bdud rtsi'i rgyun gyis thugs gtams zhing de kho na nyid la gzhol ba'i slob dpon nyi ma'i dbang po'i 'od zer dang / chag lo tsA ba dge slong chos rje dpal gyis legs par bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa/ dus phyis shong lo tsA ba dge slong blo brtan gyis legs par bcos shing dag par byas so

outline:node.outline:name: The “Hundred” Sādhanas translated by Patshab
pa tshab kyis bsgyur ba'i sgrub thabs rgya rtsa/
outline:node.outline:description: A collection of 163 sādhanas translated by the 11th-12th century Patshab Lotsāwa Nyima Drak, in most cases in the presence of the paṇḍita Abhayākara (Toh 3143-3305)

outline:node.outline:title: 'byung po 'dul byed kyi sgrub thabs yan lag dang bcas pa
bhutadamarasadhanopayika
outline:node.outline:description: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal to/ mdor bsdus shing legs par rdzogs la rnam par gsal ba dang /rim pa legs par 'brel bas 'byung po 'dul byed kyi sgrub thabs yan lag dang bcas pa sems can mtha' dag bsgral bar byed pa'i don du 'jig rten gsum gyi rdo rjes mdzes par bsdebs pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta a b+ha ya la sogs pa'i zhal snga nas/ dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: mgon po nag po'i sgrub thabs
mahakalasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: dpal dang ldan pa'i mgon po nag po'i sgrub thabs yongs su rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta a b+ha ya la sogs pa las dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o/ /snying po rtog mkhas dag gis 'gal med chos kyang 'gal bar rtog pa'i 'gro don bstan 'jug rim par bca' ba mdzad mod kyi/ bag yangs gyur dang theg mchog dus 'dir rgyus bzhos snying khu mchog dang mchog min dngos grub rnams ni sgrub byed sgrub pa'i thabs/ pa tshab tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur dge pa skyon bral des ni skye dgu chos mchog snod dang brtson ldan 'bral thob shog / dang por bdag sogs sgrib zad sngags mos sngags pa'i chos ldan skad thabs gang gis 'dul bas rtag tu chos ston gyur cig /mos pa'i khyad par gyis rgya gar na sgrub thabs bsdus pa 'ga' zhig srid na yang gzhung snyan dang gas dang ldan pas saM skr-i ta/ mchog tu gyur cing don bzang la gdams ngag che ba rnams bsdebs pa/ a b+ha ya kA ra'i phya dpe las paN+Di ta chen po de dag dang / pa tshab kyi rigs su skyes pa'i dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis sngon gyi khrims las ma 'das par bsgyur ba'i tshad du bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: rdo rje slob dpon gyi bya ba kun las btus pa
vajracaryakryasamuccaya
outline:node.outline:description: ces slob dpon gyi bya ba kun las btus pa rnam par grags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon chen po paN+Di ta a ba d+hU tI pa dpal ldan 'gro ba'i me long gis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rdo rje slob dpon rnams la nye bar mkho ba'i cho ga mtha' yas pa phyogs gcig tu bsdus pa'i bstan bcos chen po 'di nyid ni/ dpal ldan bla ma dam pa d+harma kIrti shrI b+ha dra'i dgongs rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas/ bka' lung snyan pas bskul zhing mthun rkyen phun sum tshogs pa bsgrubs pa la brten nas/ bi kra ma shI la'i paN+Di ta chen po many+dzu shrI dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba blo gros rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //bstan pa rin po che dang 'gro ba mang po la phan pa rgya chen po 'byung bar gyur cig /dpal d+harma kIrti'i gsung gi bdud rtsis bskul bar gyur pa las/ 'jig rten phan par nges par dga' ba'i paN+Di ta dang ma ti yis/ /cho ga kun las btus pa'i rin chen phung po rnam par gsal byas pa'i/ /dge bas 'jig rten rnams ni bde ba chen po nyid dang ldan gyur cig /phun sum tshogs pa kun nas 'bar zhing grags pa gsal bar ldan pas 'di ni rtag tu gnas gyur cig /nad dang mu ge las grol dgra mi lhag ma med pa'i sa skyong yun ring phyogs rnams bsrung gyur cig /tshul khrims sogs ldan yon gnas rnams ni gsung rab mdzod rnams kun nas 'phel ba nyid gyur cig / nyi ma zla ba ji bzhin nyin dang mtshan du dpal ldan d+harma kIrti dge zhing shis gyur cig /ces pa dag kyang paN+Di tsa mdzad pa'i smon lam bsgyur ba ste ji lta ba bzhin du 'grub par gyur cig /slar yang dpal ldan byang chub rtse mo'i zhabs rdul spyi bos len zhing gsung gi bdud rtsi 'thungs pa dge slong badz+ra shrIsa kyang cung zad bcos shing dag par bgyis so/ /de yis mtshon pa dge tshogs bdud rtsi'i 'od ldan pa/ /dpag yas phan bde'i 'od dkar brgyad ldan pas/ /lus can snying la gnas pa'i mun bsal zhing / /thub bstan ku mud bzhad pa'i gnyen gyur cig

outline:node.outline:name: The “Hundred” Sādhanas translated by Bari
ba ri ba’i sgrub thabs rgya rtsa/
outline:node.outline:description: A collection of 93 sādhanas translated by the paṇḍita Amoghavajra and the 11th century Khampa Lotsāwa Bari Chödrak (Toh 3306-3399)

outline:node.outline:title: dpal rdo rje gdan gyi sgrub thabs
sri-vajrasanasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: rje btsun rdo rje gdan gyi man ngag gi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga rdzogs so/ /khams pa ba ri lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: brtan pa'i 'khor lo'i cho ga
sthiracakrabhavana
outline:node.outline:description: bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sgrub thabs brtan pa'i 'khor lo bsgom pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bIR+Ya b+ha dra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o
t. virabhadra; rin chen bzang po

outline:node.outline:title: brtan pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub pa'i thabs
sthiracakrasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: brtan pa'i 'khor lo sgrub pa'i thabs slob dpon b+ha ba skan d+hasa mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo tsA ba dge slong ba ri bas bsgyur cing zhus pa'o
a. bhavaskandha; t. don yod rdo rje; ba ri ba

outline:node.outline:title: tshig lhug pa'i brtan pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs
muktakena sthiracakrasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: tshig lhug pa'i brtan pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs rdzags so/ /khams pa lo tsA ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: tshig lhug pa'i a ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs
muktena arapacaasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: tshig lhug pa'i a ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo tsA ba ba ris bsgyur ba'o
t. padma 'byung gnas; t. don yod rdo rje; ba ri

outline:node.outline:title: a ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs
arapacanasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: a ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs slon dpon chen po mi pham bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gup+ta dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o
a. mi pham bshes gnyen; t. kamalagupta; rin chen bzang po

outline:node.outline:title: 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs
manjusrisadhana
outline:node.outline:description: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /khams pa lo tsA ba ba ris bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: 'jam dpal rdo rje'i sgrub thabs
manjusrivajrasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: ngag gi rgyal po sgrub pa'i thabs
vagrajasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: ngag gi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /khams pa lo tsA ba ba ris dge slong d+harma kIrtisa bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: rgyal po chen po 'jam dpal rol ba'i sgrub thabs
maharajadidamanjusrisadhana
outline:node.outline:description: phyag rgya chen po'i rol pa'i 'jam dpal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so/ /khams pa lo tsA ba ba ri dge slong d+harma kIrtisa bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod du gsungs pa'i mdor bsdus pa'i 'jam dpal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs
vidyadharapitakasamksiptamanjusrisadhana
outline:node.outline:description: rig pa 'dzin pa'i snod du gsungs pa'i mdor bsdus pa'i 'jam dpal gyi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so/ /khams pa lo tsA ba ba ri dge slong d+harma kIrtisa bsgyur ba'o

vidyadharapitakaprtibaddhamanjusrisadhana
outline:node.outline:description: rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod kyis bsdus pa'i 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so/ /khams pa lo tsA ba ba ris dge slong gis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: 'jam dpal shes rab kyi sbyor ba
outline:node.outline:description: 'jam dpal shes rab kyi sbyor ba rdzogs so/ /khams pa lo tsA ba ba ri dge slong d+harma kIrtisa bsgyur ba'o

vajranangamanjughosasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: yan lag med pa'i rdo rje 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /khams pa lo tsA ba ba ri dge slong d+harma kIrtisa bsgyur ba'o

dharmadhatuvagisvarasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: chos kyi dbyings ngag gi dbang phyug gis sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so/ /khams pa lo tsA ba ba ri dge slong d+harma kIrtisa bsgyur ba'o

namasangtitisadhana
outline:node.outline:description: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang / ba ri lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o
a. don yod rdo rje; ba ri

outline:node.outline:title: 'jam pa'i rdo rje dpa' bo gcig tu grub pa'i sgrub thabs
manjuvajrasiddhaikavirasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: 'phags pa 'jam dpal rdo rje dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /khams pa lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi grags pas bsgyur ba'o
t. ba ri chos kyi grags pa

outline:node.outline:description: gshin rje nag po sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so/ /khams pa lo tsA ba ba ri dge slong d+harma kIrtisa bsgyur ba'o

krsnayamarisadhana
outline:node.outline:description: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /khams pa lo tsA ba ba ri dge slong chos kyi grags pas bsgyur ba'o

krsnayamarisadhana
outline:node.outline:description: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /khams pa lo tsA ba ba ri dge slong chos kyi grags pas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:description: rdo rje chos kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon su dza na pa tres mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs
simhanadasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: seng ge sgra'i sgrub thabs slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo tsA ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: hA la hA la'i sgrub thabs
halahalasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: hA la hA la'i sgrub thabs slob dpon lhan cig skyes pa rol pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang / lo tsA ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o
a. lhan cig skyes pa rol pa; t. don yod rdo rje; ba ri

outline:node.outline:title: kha sar+pa Na'i sgrub pa'i thabs
khasarpanasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: kha sar+pa NI'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo tsA ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o
t. don yod rdo rje; ba ri

avalokitesvarasadaksarasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: yi ge drug pa'i sgrub thabs/ dpal lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo tsA ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o
a. lhan cig skyes pa'i rdo rje; t/ don yod rdo rje; ba ri

outline:node.outline:title: ha ri ha ri ha ri la zhon par gyur pa'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs
harihariharivahanodbhavalokitesvarasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: ha ri ha ri ha ri la zhon par gyur pa'i spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo tsA ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur ba'o
a. rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas; t. don yod rdo rje; ba ri

halahalasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: ha la ha la'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ slob dpon lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /paN+Di ta don yod rdo rje dang / khams pa lo tsA ba dge slong ba res bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o
a. lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pa; t. don yod rdo rje; ba ri

a. rdzogs pa'i sangs rgas; t. don yod rdo rje; ba ri

a. rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas; t. don yod rdo rje; ba ri

t. don yod rdo rje; ba ri

outline:node.outline:name: Ocean of Sādhanas
sgrub thabs rgya mtsho/
sādhanasāgara
outline:node.outline:description: A collection of 245 short liturgies translated by Trakpa Gyaltsen (Toh 3400-3644)

Ocean of Sādhanas

A distinct collection of 245 short sādhanas, centered on a wide range of deities and known as the Ocean of Sādhanas (sgrub thabs rga mtsho, or Sādhanasāgara, also known as sgrub thabs kun las btus pa, or Sādhanasamuccaya ).

All 245 works were translated at Sakya in 1286 by Trakpa Gyaltsen, who received the transmission from “the great paṇḍita Gautama” through the “great paṇḍita Kīrticandra.”

The collection is closely related to a collection of sādhanas in Sanskrit found in two manuscripts of the 12th and 13th centuries, known as the Sādhanamāla (Bhattacaryya, B., Baroda, 1925).

outline:node.outline:title: lha mo sgrol ma bsgom pa'i cho ga rgyas pa
'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma bsgom pa'i cho ga rgyas pa
aryataradevibhavanaviddistara?
outline:node.outline:description: 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma bsgom pa'i cho ga rgyas pa slob dpon chen po mar me mdzad bzang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dul ba'i lha dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa
'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa
no sanskrit
outline:node.outline:description: 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa slob dpon mkhas pa dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa
'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa
arya tarasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: rje btsun ma sgrol ma la bstod pa/ dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang / lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs
'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs
arya tarasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs dpal ldan mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa'o/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+hA ka ra varma dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: chom rkun bcing ba
chom rkun bcing ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa
cokravandha?
outline:node.outline:description: chom rkun bcing ba zhes bya ba'i rig pa rdzogs so/ /ma hA paN+Di ta shrI rat+na rak+Shi ta dang / lo tsA ba zhang grub pa dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: sgrol ma'i rjes su spyod pa'i gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub thabs
'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su spyod pa'i gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub thabs
arya-taranucariyaksininisadhana
outline:node.outline:description: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i rjes su spyod pa'i gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po bai ro tsa na'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dar ma blo gros kyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: me tog phreng 'dzin gyi sgrub pa bstod pa dang bcas pa
me tog phreng 'dzin gyi sgrub pa bstod pa dang bcas pa
sragadharasadhanastoti?
outline:node.outline:description: me tog phreng 'dzin sgrol ma'i bstod pa dang bcas pas bsgrub pa rdzogs so/ /ma hA paN+Di ta rat+na rak+Shi ta pA dA'i zhal snga nas dang / zhang lo tsA ba grub pa dpal bzang pos bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: sgrol ma la bstod pa
'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa
arya-tarastotra
outline:node.outline:description: rje btsun ma la bstod pa/ slob dpon ma tri tsi Tasa mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa
'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa
aryatarastora?
outline:node.outline:description: rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la chos kyi rje paN+Di ta 'bum phrag gsum pas bstod pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa
'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa
arya taradevisadhana
outline:node.outline:description: 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: 'phags ma sgrol ma sgrub pa'i thabs
'phags ma sgrol ma sgrub pa'i thabs
arya tarasadhana
outline:node.outline:description: (bla ma )mkhan po shAkya shrI b+ha dras mdzad pa rje btsun sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so/ /rgya gar shar phyogs dza ta la'i paN+Di ta chen po bi d+hu ti tsan+d+rasa rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o

outline:node.outline:title: dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs
dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs
sarasvati sadhana
outline:node.outline:description: dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs bram ze phur bus mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: dbyangs can ma la bstod pas 'grub pa ngag gi 'od zer
tshangs pa'i bu mo dbyangs can ma la bstod pas grub pa ngag gi 'od zer zhes bya ba
brahmansutrisvorasto tranasiddhamvakasadhana nama??
outline:node.outline:description: tshangs pa'i bu mo dbyangs can ma la bstod pa 'grub pa ngag gi 'od zer zhes bya ba bram ze phur bus mdzad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs
dpal lha mo rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs
sri vajrasarasvatidevinopika?
outline:node.outline:description: dpal rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sgrub thabs snyan ngags mkhan chen slob dpon zla ba gzhon nus mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /rnam par bshad pa'i paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyA na dang / lo tsA ba dge slong byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: nor rgyun ma'i bsgrub thabs
dpal nor rgyun ma'i bsgrub thabs
shrivasudhara sadhana
nor rgyun ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa
'phags pa nor rgyun ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa
no sanskrit
outline:node.outline:description: 'phags pa nor rgyun ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so

outline:node.outline:title: nor rgyun ma'i smon lam dang bstod pa
bcom ldan 'das nor rgyun ma'i smon lam dang bstod pa
outline:node.outline:description: bcom ldan 'das nor rgyun ma'i sgrub thabs dang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa dang smon lam dang bstod pa rnams rdzogs so/ /tshul 'di ni dpang lo tsA ba dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas zhol phug tu/ rgya dpe las bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'i yi ge pa dang bskul ba po ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rin chen mtha' can yin no

outline:node.outline:title: mkha' lding grub pa'i bstan bcos
mkha' lding grub pa'i bstan bcos
siddhigurudashasto?
outline:node.outline:description: dpal mkha' lding grub pa'i bram ze shang kus mdzad pa rdzogs so/ /gu na sa ga ra/ 'dir ni bla ma dam pa'i rjes 'brangs te/ dpal ldan shang ku bdag gis mdor bsdus bris/ dge ba de yis srid gsum ma lus pa/ dug med bdud rtsi'i go phong bsten par shog /rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal bram ze a ba d+hU tI pa che po dpe med kyi zhal sngar/ lo tsA ba ban+de pradz+nyA kIrtisa bsgyur ba'o// /dbang phyug chen pos mkha' lding du sprul nas mkha' lding rgya mtsho ba 'bum phrag bzhi bshad/ de bram ze sang kus dbang bskur gyi tshe klu bdun gyi dug yod pa la/ 'jog pa'i dug kham phor du mar dang sbrang rtsi byin pa ma yog /bdun po kun gyi bu mo nub mo bkug nas chung mar byas/ 'jog pa'i bkug pas mos phu byas pas dug gis zin nas shi la thug pas/ yul mi kun gyis khyed grong na nged kyi dug sus gso byas pas/ mchog sdong tshugs shig zir nas nam mkha' ldeng gi mchod sdeng rdo rings steng du btsug steng nas rdo'i gdugs phub pa gcig byas/ khos 'khyung nas sngags bzlas te/ kun du zhi bar byed do/ de lta bu'i shang kus mdzad do//dus dang dus ma yin pa lnga ste/ rma'i mtshan nyed dang / pho nya'i mtshan nyid dang / gnas dang /tshes grangs dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / chos mthun pa dang / mi mthun pa dang / dus dang /dgos pa'i dbye ba dang / rags pa dang / stong pa ste dug zin gyi mtshan nyid dang /dus ma yin pa mi 'chi ba bstan pa'o//nyid dgos pa gsum/ phrin las thams cad kyi snod du 'gyur ba'i dgos pa dang / sems kyi srog 'dzin pa'i dang / phyogs thams cad du grags pas khyab pa'o/ mchod brdzod dang / dgod 'brel dang / gzhung bshad pa gsum mo/ gzhung la gnyis/ lus rnam gzhag dang / yan lag rgyas bshad do

outline:node.outline:title: lha mo dbyangs can gyi bstod pa
sarasvatistotra-nama
outline:node.outline:description: dbyangs can gyi bstod pa 'di ni/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud du byung ba'i mkhas pa chen po paN+Di ta nag mo'i khol gyis dbyangs can ma'i zhal gzigs pa'i dus su dgyes te bstod pa rdzogs so/ /gang zhig 'di 'don pa la shes rab stsol bar khas blangs so/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dz+nyA na shI la dang / lo tsA ba dge slong chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o

outline:node.outline:title: dkyil 'khor gyi chos mdor bsdus pa
dharmamandalasutra
outline:node.outline:description: a. sangs rgyas gsang ba; t. sangs rgyas gsang ba; dbas manjusri; bran ka mutita; ka ba dpal brtsegs

outline:node.outline:title: gzhal yas khang gsal bar byed pa'i mngon rtogs mun sel sgron ma

tattvatarakhyasakalasugatavacasamksiptavyakyaprakarana
outline:node.outline:description: a. ye shes grags pa; t. padmakaravarma; rin chen bzang po

outline:node.outline:name: Works of Atiśa
jo bo'i chos chung/
outline:node.outline:description: A compilation (not included in all editions) of works by the 11th century Bengali Buddhist scholar Atiśa Dīpaṃkaraśrījñāna, who spent his final years teaching in Tibet (Toh 4465-4567)

Works of Atiśa

This section, included in some later printings of the Degé Tengyur, contains a compilation of works by Atiśa Dīpaṃkaraśrījñāna, 982-1054, also known as Jowo Jé (jo bo rje).

All of the 103 works in this volume (Toh 4465-4567) are duplicates of Atiśa’s works found elsewhere in the Tengyur, with the exception of 3 very short texts (Toh 4515, 4516, and 4548).

For convenient reference, nevertheless, a full list of the titles and alternate Toh numbers will be added in a later update.

outline:node.outline:name: bstan 'gyur dkar chag/
Tengyur catalogue

outline:node.outline:description: Historical and descriptive catalogue of the Degé Tengyur by its 18th century editor Zhuchen Tsültrim Rinchen (Toh 4569).

outline:node.outline:title: bstan 'gyur dkar chag

thams cad mkhyen pa chen po nyi ma'i gnyen gyi bka' lung spyi dang bye brag gi dgongs don ram par 'grel pa'i bstan bcos gangs can pa'i skad du 'gyur ro 'tshal gyi chos sbyin rgyun mi 'chad pa'i ngo mtshan 'phrul gyi phyi mo rdzogs ldan bskal pa'i bsod nams kyi sprin phung rgyas par dkrigs pa'i tshul las brtsams pa'i gtam ngo mtshar chu gter 'phel ba'i zla ba gsar pa
outline:node.outline:description: a. zhu chen tshul khrims rin chen
